100_UI/Button/Back to Title: Save and return to title screen
100_UI/Button/ChangeScroll: Create a scroll from Enchanting Fragments
100_UI/Button/Help: Click this if you cannot connect
100_UI/Button/LookMysetRegister: Register current appearance to this slot
100_UI/Button/MysetRegister: Register current equipment to this slot
100_UI/Button/NoSkillPoint: You don't have any skill points.
100_UI/Button/Pet2: Turn a captured monster into a pet
100_UI/Button/SkillSetRegister: Register current skills to this slot
100_UI/CharaCreate/Detail/Demon:
This race has a robust body and can handle weapons fairly.
Their melee skills and melee attacks will be strengthened, and the amount of life and its regeneration will be increased, though the amount of mana will be lowered, and they cannot perform magic attacks well since they are not good at controlling mana.
100_UI/CharaCreate/Detail/Elves:
This race can control mana and bows fairly.
Their magic skills and arrow attacks will be strengthened, and the amount of mana and its regeneration will be increased, though they are not tough and not good at melee attacks.
100_UI/CharaCreate/Detail/Human:
This race is average and can handle weapons and magic decently.
Some say this race lacks characteristics, but the race with infinite possibilities for the future is human.
100_UI/CharaCreate/NoChara:
There are no characters yet.
Let's create a character!
(Data transfer from the legacy Craftopia can be done via the settings option in title screen.)
100_UI/CharaCreate/NoSelectRace: Race can be changed only when you create a character.
100_UI/Confirmation/Delete item:
Are you sure you want to remove this item?
<color=red>You CANNOT undo this action</color>
100_UI/Confirmation/Restore:
This will restore data from backup.
If you restore this data, the current data will be overwritten. Are you sure?
100_UI/ConnectFailed/AlreadyConnected: An user with the same ID has already joined the server.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/DeviceName2Byte: Double-byte characters are used in the device name; change to single-byte characters in the Windows settings.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/NoCharacter: No character selected. Failed to connect to the server.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/NotSameVersion: The version of the game and the server are different.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/ServerLocked: Connection to the server is currently limited.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/ServerSceneLoading: Server is loading. Please reconnect after loading is complete.
100_UI/ConnectFailed/ServerSceneNotSame: You have disconnected because the different map was loaded than the host player. (This could happen when you try to connect while the host player is moving to a different island.)
100_UI/ConnectFailed/Timeout:
Timed out.
(This error may occur even if another player is connecting.)
(If this error occurs repeatedly, restart your PC and you may be able to connect).
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/BossLife/Detail: You can adjust the amount of bosses' Life. If it's 200%, bosses will have doubled Life.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/Damage ratio/Det: You can adjust the amount of received damage. If it's 200%, you'll receive doubled damage.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/Despenalty Defen: You can adjust the amount of DEF Death Penalty. If it's 50%, your DEF will be 50% when you die.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/EnemyLife/Detail: You can adjust the amount of mobs' Life. If it's 200%, mobs will have doubled Life.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/HungerDamageRati: You can adjust the amount of hunger damage you receive when you're hungry. If it's 50%, you will receive the damage same as 50% of your max Life.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/HungerReductionT: You can adjust how fast you'll be hungry. If it's 200%, you will be hungry twice faster than usual.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/Stamina/Detail: You can adjust the amount of stamina consumed while performing actions such as run.
100_UI/CustomDifficulty/Starvation/Detai: You can enable/disable if you could be starving to death. If it's checked, starvation is enabled.
100_UI/Detail/Change port: Port can be changed from the settings.
100_UI/Detail/EasyConnection: Disabling this would require you to configure port forwarding on your own.
100_UI/Detail/EnchantDetail: *If you do Forcible Enchanting, the enchantment Reinforced will be attached to an item.
100_UI/Detail/EOSGuest:
If the host has selected 'Join via Invite Code', you can join by entering the Invite Code.
You can check the Invite Code from the host's Esc screen.
100_UI/Detail/ForbiddenWord: Some symbols and banned words cannot be used.
100_UI/Detail/Host_Impossible:
It seems that other players will be unable to join if you host the game with your current network environment. 
(Others will be able to join through LAN connection, so ignore this if you are playing over LAN.)

Try asking somebody else to host.
100_UI/Detail/Host_Impossible2:
t seems that other players will be unable to join if you host the game with your current network environment. 
(Others will be able to join through LAN connection, so ignore this if you are playing over LAN.)

Would you like to still host the game?
100_UI/Detail/Host_Impossible3:
The Invite Code can also be found from the Esc menu after starting the game.

Since anyone with the Invite Code can join,
Please set a password in order to prevent unwanted joins.
100_UI/Detail/MissionTracking: Tracked missions will be shown at the top right corner
100_UI/Detail/RepairWorkshop: Restoring the maximum durability will always cost the same amount.
100_UI/Detail/Steam:
CAUTION

If you have Steam set to hide the game you are currently playing, other players will be unable to see you in the lobby.
Host players should always <color=yellow>Show gameplay activity from their profile's privacy settings. </color>

If a host player selects "Steam Connection", <color=yellow>guest players cannot join the game via IP Connection.</color>
Guests should join via Steam.
100_UI/Detail/Steam_Error:
Connection to the Steam server has failed.
Please check if you've logged into Steam and the status has been set to online.
100_UI/Detail/SteamIP:
If a host has selected "Join via Invite Code", <color=yellow>you cannot join the game via IP connection.</color>
Please join via Invite Code .
100_UI/Detail/Tracking: Tracked info will be shown at the top right corner

100_UI/NewDifficulty/Detail:
*There is no change in the achievements that can be obtained
*There is no change in the rewards or drop items obtained from enemies
*The difficulty level can be changed at any time in single player mode
*The difficulty level is saved as a world setting
100_UI/NewDifficulty/Hard_Detail:
∙Monsters become more aggressive and durable
∙Drop all items other than equipped ones on death
100_UI/NewDifficulty/HardlSub: For players loving more challenges than Survival
100_UI/NewDifficulty/HellSub: Even the hell is easier than this mode
100_UI/NewDifficulty/SlowLifeDetail:
∙Satiety and stamina decrease slowly
∙No penalty on death
∙Similar to classic Craftopia
100_UI/NewDifficulty/Survival_Detail:
∙Challenging combat and survival
∙Drop items and money on death
100_UI/NewDifficulty/VeryHard_Detail:
∙Combat against mobs become deadlier
∙Drop all items on death
∙Strict food management required

100_UI/Opening/Telop/text01:
Welcome, [A]. Do you remember <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">Earth</font>? 
It is the planet you <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">destroyed</font>.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text02:
You don't remember? I see …… That's to be expected.
But <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">you definitely destroyed it</font>.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text03:
We knew that the destruction would eventually happen in that world line…
Mankind raised fire, cleared the forest, developed industries, and prospered…
Spent their days praying for the god and appreciating small happinesses…
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text05:
But the great <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">god (Krael)</font> decided to grant another chance. 
To mankind. And to you too.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text06: You shall land on the ground again and lead this new world, <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">Craftopia</font>, down the righteous path.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text07:
You shall vanquish the <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">dragons</font>, equip yourself with <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">legendary weapons</font>, and build <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">great monuments</font> that can be seen from any part of this world.
By that time, you shall reveal the secret hidden in this world.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text08: [A], in <material="FOT-TsukuMinPr6-H SDF Material_Red">Craftopia</font>, you get to start it all over again.
100_UI/Opening/Telop/text09: May you prosper in this world, may the god bless you.

100_UI/Quest/Reportable: Return and report to a client
100_UI/Setting/AutoHotkeySet/Detail: Obtained items will be assigned to hotkeys if you enable it
100_UI/Setting/Creative/BuildingDamage/D: Buildings will not take any damage if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/BuildingRestrict: Guest players cannnot build or deploy if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/InfinitST/Detail: Your stamina will not decrease if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/InGameTime/Detai: The time in the game will be the one you set here.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/NoDamage/Detail: You will not take any damage if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/NoDeath/Detail: Your life will not fall below 1 if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/NoHunger/Detail: Your satisfy will not decrease if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/SimpleCraft/Deta: You can craft any items without materials if you enable it.
100_UI/Setting/Creative/Tab/Admission: Settings that are reflected when you start a game
100_UI/Setting/DayTime/TimeFlows: No Fixed Time(Sunlight varies as the time passes)
100_UI/Setting/Detail/AheadCam: The camera will move ahead of the player to show the upcoming path.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Aim Assist: The camera movement automatically slows down when the aiming sight is on the enemy while aiming. The larger the number, the slower it gets.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Auto Target: A player automatically faces the direction of the enemy when attacking; however, the movement input will take priority to change direction. Some attacks cannot be affected by this function.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/AutoSave: There is a possibility of a freeze, crash, or an item loss because we are still in early access. We recommend you to turn on the Auto Save.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/CameraOffset: The distance between a player and a camera.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/CameraRecoil: Shake the camera according to the recoil of guns. It doesn't stop shaking guns when you shoot even though you turn off this option.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Controller_In_deve:
<size=150%><color=red>ATTENTION!! Controller support is still under development!</color></size>
Compatibility with controllers are still under development so there's a chance that you'll be unable to move the player as you like or you'll encounter bugs. At this present time, we recommend playing with the keyboard. We're planning to improve the game with the coming updates so please hang on.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/DropItem: You can change the max number of items on the field. The bigger, the more items can exist on the field at the same time, but the performance might be affected.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/FarClipPlane: The distance that the game will render. Lowering the render distance will improve performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/FootPrint: Enables footprints to be seen. Disabling this will improve performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/GrassBend: Enables grass animations. Disabling this will improve performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/HomeOnly: This option can only be changed via the home screen

100_UI/Setting/Detail/LOD Bias: Modifies the rendering of objects in a distant. The smaller the value, the simplified the rendering, so it improves the performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Mission: During gameplay, the list of missions will be displayed on the top right of your screen.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/PeepCam: If the top and bottom angles are large, the camera's position will go back and forth.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Physics Limit:
Disable the physics processing afar from a player to increase the performance especially with a map with many buildings.
  *This option can be changed only from a home screen.
  *This setting doesn't affect conveyor belts, they keep working.
  *If you deploy "Artificial Monoliths" that you can craft in-game, they will activate the physics processing around them even though it's afar from a player.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/PostProcessing: Enables post processing and HDR. Disabling this will improve performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Rendering accuracy: This option defines the resolution of 3D rendering. The bigger, the more beautiful, but the performance might be affected.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/Shadow: Enables shadows. Disabling this will improve performance.
100_UI/Setting/Detail/shit: Please note that you'll have less opportunity to obtain specific items if you disable it.
100_UI/Setting/Difficulty/CanNotTouch: Game Difficulty can be changed during the game in Singleplayer mode
100_UI/Setting/Difficulty/Casual: Casual: Explore the world and to enjoy life in a different world at your own pace.
100_UI/Setting/Difficulty/Detail:
※ It is saved separately for the world.
※ In Multiplayer, the difficulty setting of the server will be applied to the game.
※ This setting will affect the maximum life and the status of enemies.
※ Rewards and drop items will not be affected by this setting.

100_UI/Setting/Difficulty/Pro: Very Hard: For experts; only truly strong players can survive.

100_UI/Text/Closed:
Craftopia is still in Early Access. There is a chance you will encounter bugs.
Multiplayer is still being developed and could be very unstable. Please restart the game when necessary.
100_UI/Text/Closed_Popup:
- Thank you very much for purchasing Craftopia.

- <color="orange">About the Early Access</color>
  - Craftopia is in the stage of the <color="red" size=26>Early Access</color>.
  - The game is under development; therefore, the game still contains bugs and unimplemented elements. We ask for your patience as we plan to work on improving the game.
  - Not all ages are available and not all skills are available to learn.
  - More bosses, vehicles, weapon types such as Spears, Scythes, Guns are planned.

- <color="orange">About the Multiplayer</color>
  - We are focusing on multiplayer with our best efforts, but it could be unstable.
  - Reconnecting by restarting your client will sometimes fix issues faced in multiplayer.
  - If restarting the client does not work, the host may have to restart.

This will delete [A].

100_UI/Text/Detail/0NotFixed: Island level varies depending on the player level if you set it to 0.
100_UI/Text/Detail/BigPot:
Any dish processed with the pot will be place in an open slot.
Cooking will not begin if there are no open slots.
100_UI/Text/Detail/DragonOnly:
Currently only dragons are tamable.
Support for more monsters will be added in the future.
100_UI/Text/Detail/EnchantAssignment: Consume Enchanting Scroll to apply its enchantments to the selected item such as Weapon, Armor, or Building.
100_UI/Text/Detail/EnchantResult: Apply Enchantment to the selected item.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Fee: The payment fee will be subtracted from your balance.
100_UI/Text/Detail/FreeBuildMode: In Free Build Mode, you can craft anything without worrying about materials. Please enjoy experimenting and building as you desire. However, you cannot take items out of Creative Mode.
100_UI/Text/Detail/GameMode:
The way you progress in the game dramatically varies depending on the game mode.
If you are playing Craftopia for the first time, it's recommended to select Normal World.
*Once you have created a world, you cannot change its game mode later.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Hell:
In front of you lies a path with harsh environments and extremely strong enemies.
Only the most prepared challenger with enough gears, or the luckiest cowards can return.
100_UI/Text/Detail/IslandSelect: Please select an island to play in Creative Mode
100_UI/Text/Detail/LoadFailed: An error occurred during loading the latest news. Please check the news page to read the latest news of Craftopia.

100_UI/Text/Detail/Only the host touches: Only host player can change settings
100_UI/Text/Detail/PetChest:
Only captured monsters can be placed here.
<color=red>When converted into pets, they will become Lv1.</color>
100_UI/Text/Detail/PetMachine:
In a Pet Machine, you can convert the captured monster into your pet monster.
*A pet monster will not disappear when its life reaches 0. They will rest in your inventory until they're ready to fight again.
You can store your pet monsters in this machine.
100_UI/Text/Detail/PictureBook:
You can earn experience points by filling up Picture Book.
You should proactively fill the book and bring your level up!
100_UI/Text/Detail/PlayableMode: In Playable Mode, you can play on the island created in Free Build Mode with various conditions.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Q&A:
<color=yellow>The link takes you to the FAQ and how to connect Multiplayer.
If you find yourself stuck, please take a look.</color>
100_UI/Text/Detail/Recycle machine: Items you put will be converted into Recycled Item. Every time the total price of the items you put reaches 5000G, it will generate 1 Recycled Item.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Refiner/MainChest:
Put the weapon you want to refine into this chest.
※ Type of Refining Stones required vary based on the Refining Level of the weapon.
※ The maximum Refining Level increases as the era progresses.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Refiner/MaterialStone:
Put the required type of Refining Stone.
You need to put the same rank of Refining Stones as the weapon you want to refine.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Refiner/MaterialWPChe:
Put the weapon you want to use as Refining Material. Enchantments attached to the weapons here will be <color=red>gone</color>.
※ You need to put the weapon of the same name as the weapon you put into the Chest for Refining Weapon.
※ If you put the refined weapon, its Refining Level will be added to the result.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Seed Making Machine: 1 to 3 seeds will be randomly generated.

Are you sure you want to reset all the skills?
You CANNOT undo this action.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Smelting:
No weapons are selected.
Please put the weapon into Chest for Refining Weapon.
100_UI/Text/Detail/Thermal Power Plant: Items you put will be converted into Battery. Every time the total price of the items you put reaches 1000G, it will generate 1 Battery. If you put fuel items, it may generate more Batteries.
100_UI/Text/Detail/UpdateMain: The long-waited update "Seamless World Update" has been released. "Map Improvement", "Combat Improvement", "New Dungeons", "Improvements on Character Models and Buildings", "New Enemies and Bosses", and More! We hope you'll have tons of fun with this update!

These items are inherited from the previous Craftopia.
Items in the inventory are stored here; you cannot return them once you pull them out.
Inherited items are special, and their stats are inherited.
Once they're lost, there's no way to get them back in the world of Craftopia.

100_UI/Title/UpdateTime: Seamless World Update has been released on 2023/06/28 Wed 12:00 JST!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/Creative/First_01:
Welcome to Creative Mode!
Creative Mode is the special mode that focuses on "making things" and has different gameplays.
You usually need to defeat enemies and explore around the world to gather materials to craft items, but you no longer need to have materials when you craft items in Creative Mode!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/Creative/First_02:
Let's open up "Creative Tab" via the TAB menu.
You can craft pickaxes, axes, various workbenches at your will.
You can also craft items on workbenches and blacksmiths without any materials.
Feel free to craft anything you want, but please note that you cannot take items out of Creative Mode!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/Creative/First_03:
In Creative Setting, you can set various options such as player level, status, nullifying damage to players or buildings.
You can do many things in this mode: devote yourself to build with an infinite amount of resources, practice combat against enemies, and compete with your friends on a race circuit that you build.
Your imagination is the only limit. Hope you'll enjoy Creative Mode!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/First_01:
Welcome to the world of Craftopia!
The previous civilizations were destroyed by your action!
Let's rebuild the civilization in this new land with rebirthed humans!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/First_02:
In this land of Craftopia, you can gather a variety of materials based on areas.
Explore the field, gather materials, and craft many items that are helpful in your adventure!
100_UI/Tutorial/Text/First_03:
The number of items you can craft will increase as you repair "Tower" and progress "Era"!
Complete quests and progress eras to craft stronger and more useful items!
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Anubis1:
"Anubis" is a servant of Krael the God who has been overwatching the world of Craftopia.

Anubis will bless you in exchange of slates and orbs. The blasphemy is highly not recommended.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Bed1:
"Bed" can be deployed and used to set the respawning point for you.

Please note that you can set only one respawning point.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Challenge1:
"Anubis' Trial" can be challenged by interacting with a pedestal of red crystal that can be seen around the world.

The content of "Anubis' Trial" is varied depending on the pedestal of red crystal, and some trials require you to have specific items to clear. You'll be rewarded items such as "Slate of Growth", money, or exp when you clear.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Crystal:
Once the stored energy of your weapon is full, "Extractor Paracelsus" can extract an "Energy Crystal" from the weapon.

"Energy Crystal" is the crystal that holds the power of defeated monsters.
By consuming these crystals, you will obtain a scroll of rare enchantments.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Enchant1:
"Enchantment" is the special power that various items have.
If you extract its power from items, it'll be "Enchanting Fragment". You can use it apply its enchantment to other items.

Enchanting Fragment can be extracted by multi-selecting enchanted items via sub menu of the inventory. If you scrollify those fragments, you can give it to other players.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/EnchantTable1:
"Enchanting Table" is the building that you use to consume "Enchanting Fragment" and apply enchantments to items of your choice.


Quality and quantity of the enchantments that you can apply to an item is limited by the cost; however, the further era you progress, the higher the cost limit will be.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Farm1:
You can sow seeds onto "Farming Plot" to grow crops.

Sowing seeds onto "Farming Plot" and watering them to grow crops.
Under special weathers such as "Rainy", Farming Plots will be watered automatically.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Food:
If your "Satiety" is getting low, your maximum "Stamina" will decrease and you will take hunger damage over time.

You can consume food items, such as "Animal Flesh" or "Meals" to restore your "Satiety".
You should eat constantly to maintain your "Satiety" in order to survive.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttack1:
Some enemies have "Shield Gauge".

Dealing damage will decrease the gauge. Once the gauge reaches 0, "Shield Break" will happen and the enemies will receive more damage.
Please note that some attack can penetrate shield as well.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttack2:
You can activate "Perfect Dodge" by performing a dodge at the last possible second.

If you succeed in "Perfect Dodge", the time will slow down and you can perform "Power Attack" to greatly decrease the enemy's "Shield Gauge".
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttack2HSword1:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Two-handed Sword's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will approach an enemy and consume all "Charged" buff to perform vertical slash. The more the buff consumed, the more damage it deals.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttack2HSword2: With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will approach an enemy and perform horizontal slash. This grants you "Charged" buff for a longer duration than usual.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackBow1:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Bow's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will backstep and shoot an arrow at an enemy. For a certain duration, the body part which is shot will receive increased damage from arrow and bullet shot by the player who performs the Power Attack.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackBow2: With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will backstep and shoot arrows in a fan shape. You can hit multiple enemies with this Power Attack.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackDual1:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Dual Wield's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will approach an enemy and perform spin slash which hits an enemy multiple times.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackDual2: With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will approch an enemy and perform consecutive attack that deals AoE damage to a larger area. You can only perform this while you have the maximum amount of "Rush" buff.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackGun1:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Gun's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will backstep to maintain proper distance and shoot all bullets remaining in a magazine. If no bullets remain in a magazine, this Power Attack reloads instead.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackGun2: With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will backstep to maintain proper distance and throw an Explosive Barrel to make it explode. If no bullets remain in a magazine, this Power Attack reloads instead.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackKatana1: Katana's Power Attack can be performed with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM] after successful "Perfect Dodge" or counterattacks.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackKatana2:
1. After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Katana's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will approach an enemy and perform horizontal slash to deal damage to surrounding. If Detect buff has 4 or more stacks, this Power Attack consumes 3 stacks to perform thrust attack as well. If Detect buff has the maximum stack, this Power Attack performs additional attack.
With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will approach an enemy and perform horizontal slash to deal damage to surrounding.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackKatana3:
2. There are 2 types of counterattack, "Returning Stance" counterattack and "Detect" counterattack.
　You can perform "Returning Stance" counterattack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM] at the moment of an enemy's attack.
　With [KEYMAP:MELEE], "Returning Stance" counterattack has a shield bash effect, and the motion of the following Iai attack will be greatly changed.
　With [KEYMAP:AIM], "Returning Stance" counterattack has a shield bash effect, and it deals AoE shield breaking damage to a large surrounding area.

　You can perform "Detect" counterattack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM] at the moment of an enemy's attack while returning Katana into the sheath.
　With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will approach an enemy and perform horizontal slash to deal damage to surrounding. If Detect buff has 4 or more stacks, this Power Attack consumes 3 stacks to perform thrust attack as well. If Detect buff has the maximum stack, this Power Attack performs additional attack.
　With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will approach an enemy and perform horizontal slash to deal damage to surrounding.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackLance:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Spear's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE].

You will approach an enemy and perform vertical slash. If you throw a spear before the Power Attack, you will retrieve the spear. This Power Attack grants you "Throw Spear" buff.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackShield:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Shield's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:AIM].

You will approach an enemy and deal AoE damage to a surrounding area.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackStaff1:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform Magic Staff's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE] or [KEYMAP:AIM].

With [KEYMAP:MELEE], you will absorb energy from an enemy. This Power Attack grants you "Concentration" buff.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackStaff2: With [KEYMAP:AIM], you will backstep and shoot multiple Arcane Bolt.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/JustAttackSword:
After successful Perfect Dodge, you can perform One-handed Sword's Power Attack with [KEYMAP:MELEE].

You will approach an enemy and perform melee attack.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Mission1:
In the "Mission" screen, you can check the detail of ongoing quests.

If you forget what to do in a quest, please open the "Mission" screen.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Portal1:
"Warp Portal" is the building that allows you to quickly teleport to places to places.

"Warp Portal" can be "activated" by interacting with it, and allows you to do fast travel if you've already repaired the "Wedge Tower" of the area.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Prism1:
"Monster Prism" can be used to capture monsters.
In order to capture monsters, you need to weaken them by decreasing their life first.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Prism2:
"Pet Management Machine" can be used to tame captured monsters as your pet.

Your pet will learn skills and join your combat.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/QuestRoot1:
If you open the "Map" after accepting "Quest", the positions of required items and target monsters will be displayed on the map.

If you forget where to go in a quest, please open the "Map".
100_UI/VisualTutorial/RespawnPoint1:
"Great Sword of Recovery" is the building that allows you to respawn when defeated.

"Great Sword of Recovery" can be "activated" by interacting with it, and you can respawn at the last "Great Sword of Recovery" you interact when defeated. You can also teleport to it by fast travel.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Smelting1:
"Refinery" is the building that you use to strengthen weapons.

You can strengthen weapons of your choice by consuming "Refining Stone".
The type of "Refining Stone" required is varied on weapon's level.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Smelting2:
"Refining Scrap Bench" is the building that you can scrap weapons to obtain "Refining Stone".

You can consume "Refining Stone" at "Refinery" to strengthen your weapons.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/SoulOrb1:
"Soul Orb" is the crystalized soul that is hidden in a variety of place around the world.

You can give obtained Soul Orbs to "Anubis" to exchange with special items.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Terminal1:
After you clear a dungeon, you can directly enter the boss fight when you re-enter the dungeon.

You can change its setting by interacting with a device next to the gate.
You'll be able to challenge the dungeon with higher difficulty by increasing era level.
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Torch1:
At night, your vision is limited and some enemies start to act violently.
"Torch" can be used to light up surroundings and caves.

You can equip "Torch" to activate its effect.
"Torch" can be crafted on "Workbench".
100_UI/VisualTutorial/Tower1:
"Wedge Tower" is the important building that can be repaired by putting materials.

After you repair "Wedge Tower", important buildings around the tower will be activated. And this allows you to teleport to other towers or Warp Portals, and to unlock the feature of "Era Progression".
100_UI/VisualTutorial/WireHook1:
"Wire Hook" is the equipment that allows you to move swiftly to the direction of your choice.

You can continuously use it up to twice, even in a midair, to move or dodge acrobatically.

101_Tips/0: By using skill points, you will be able to earn skills.
101_Tips/1: Using a weapon will fill up it's "Stored Energy". By consuming the maximum amount of "Stored Energy", you can obtain "Energy Crystal" that can be used to gain rare enchantments.
101_Tips/10: "Dodge Action" is the crucial skill in combat. If you perform it at the very last second, you can perform "Power Attack" after.
101_Tips/11: "Chest" is a craftable item that can be used to store items inside.
101_Tips/12: To be able of equip Two-handed Swords and Katanas, you must obtain the skill "Two-Handed".
101_Tips/13: When equipped with a Glider, pressing the jump button during jumping will let you glide.
101_Tips/14: When you don't know what to do because you just started the game, check the upper right corner of your screen and look through the Missions.
101_Tips/15: Want to be able to create more weapons? First, make a Workbench and using the Workbench, create a Blacksmith!
101_Tips/16: Buildings and vehicles placed on the ground can be itemized and retrieved.
101_Tips/17: Mono is a mysterious creature that has existed in the world of Craftopia for a very long time. Rumor has it that they come from the farthest point of the universe. If you pour water on them, they will ...?
101_Tips/18:
If you throw a Monster Prism at a living being, you can capture them.
A human being is also subject to capture because it's living.
101_Tips/19: If you offer "Slate of Growth" to Anubis on the sky island, you can increase maximum Life and maximum Stamina.
101_Tips/2: In order to acquire Tier 2 skills, you must acquire a certain number of Tier 1 skills.
101_Tips/20: [ITEM:1920] is a facility that gathers dropped logs on the field. The drones themselves can't cut trees, though.
101_Tips/21: Need a better fishing rod? Craft [ITEM:2124] then! You have a chance to catch more than one fish at once with it.
101_Tips/22:
"For Advanced Players"
Let's start automating the production. Deploy an Excavator on a harvestable bedrock and place Conveyor Belts to carry Ores to your base.
101_Tips/23:
"For Advanced Players"
With the help of "Refinery", you can craft very strong weapons.
Consume "Refining Stone" to strengthen weapons at "Refinery".
101_Tips/24:
If you install an Absorber onto a chest,
it will automatically store dropped items nearby into the chest.
101_Tips/25:
"For Advanced Players"
Install [ITEM:1926] onto a chest and a crafting facility; it will send items to the crafting facility.
If you also install [ITEM:1924] onto the crafting facility, it will start fully automated production.
101_Tips/26: It's better to craft and bring [ITEM:5546] with you when you explore the place of ultra-high temperature.
101_Tips/27: Completing all missions in a mission category will give you bonuses such as extra slots of inventory or additional skill points.
101_Tips/28:
Some items in the world have "Enchantments" such as "[ENCHANT:54]" and "[ENCHANT:11]".
The better Enchantments, the better the stats will be.
101_Tips/29:
"For Advanced Players"
You can extract "Enchantments" from items to make fragments, and consume them on "Enchanting Table" to apply enchantments of your choice.
As the era progresses, you can apply more enchantments to an item!
101_Tips/3: Gain experience points when defeating enemies. Gain enough experience points to level up. Earn skill points as you level up.
101_Tips/30: Craft [ITEM:206] if you want to furnish your base. The useful items like [ITEM:5141], which prevent mobs from spawning nearby, can be crafted there.
101_Tips/31:
You can craft vehicles at a Machine Factory.
They will give you mobility around the field.
101_Tips/32: Wooden buildings are flammable. The cases have been reported: a whole base got burnt down when a wild cow stepped into a campfire and charged towards a base. Be careful.
101_Tips/33: Find it difficult to fight monsters? Learn [ITEM:859] and register it to a hotkey then. It'll surely help you.
101_Tips/34: If you set two same animals onto [ITEM:293], you can breed them.
101_Tips/35: [ITEM:3516] is a craftable building that you can use to store captured monsters and to tame them as your "Pets".
101_Tips/36:
You can't capture boss monsters only with Monster Prisms!
In order to capture them, you should weaken them and hit them with 4 of [ITEM:3515] to detain them before throwing a Monster Prism!
*Please note that not every boss monsters are available to capture at the moment.
101_Tips/37: You can tame a monster with [ITEM:3516] to ride them, to explore together, and to fight together.
101_Tips/4: Sometimes the multiplayer mode may get unstable. If something goes wrong, oftentimes the situation will be solved by restarting the game on the client's side. The loading time may be long but please read these tips and hang on.
101_Tips/5: You can attack or mine also by long-pressed clicks. If you are tired of repeated clicking, use the long-pressed clicks.
101_Tips/6: Tools such as Bucket (Water), or Seed can be placed as a sub weapon on the right hand and can be used by right clicking.
101_Tips/7: By registering an item to the hotkey on the bottom of the screen , you can use the item without opening the menu screen.
101_Tips/8: Weapons and armors can also be placed on the hotkey.
101_Tips/9:
You can equip Bucket (Empty) and use it around a water source, earning you a Bucket (Water).
By using the Bucket (Water) on a Wheat Field or Farming Plot, you can start producing.

203_ItemDescription/0: There is not enough space to explain this item. Even though it doesn't seem to be a valuable item, it could be a precious item full of infinite possibilities, maybe.
203_ItemDescription/1002: Decreases the received damage when you block enemies' attacks with a shield.
203_ItemDescription/1003: Gain the ability to wield dual swords. The [STATS:ATK] and Skill Damage will increase while wielding dual swords each skill level.
203_ItemDescription/1004: Gain the ability to wield two-handed weapons and katana. The [STATS:ATK] of the two-handed weapon will increase and its [STATS:ST_CONSUME_RATE] will decrease if skill  up. With a two-handed weapon and katana, you can use <size=18>[KEYMAP:AIM]</size> to "charge".
203_ItemDescription/1005: Allows you to reflect enemy arrows and magic attacks with well-timed shield bashes.
203_ItemDescription/1006: This will allow you to double-jump. Jump height increases with higher skill level.
203_ItemDescription/1007: Gain the ability to aim with a bow while jumping with <size=18> [KEYMAP:AIM] </size> command.
203_ItemDescription/1008: Increases the [STATS:ATK] of your bare hands.
203_ItemDescription/1009: Increases the damage of the bow's normal attack.
203_ItemDescription/1010: Siginificantly increase the damage you deal when mining or chopping trees with your bare hand.
203_ItemDescription/1011: Become invulnerable for a brief moment when you crouch down.
203_ItemDescription/1012: Become invulnerable for a brief moment as you jump.
203_ItemDescription/1013: When you retrieve an item from a building, you also obtain an amount of [STATS:MONEY] that's a portion of the item's selling price.
203_ItemDescription/1014: There is a chance to restore [STATS:HP] when attacking enemies with melee attacks.
203_ItemDescription/1015: Significantly increases your swimming speed in oceans and rivers.
203_ItemDescription/1016: When your [STATS:HP] becomes low, [STATS:ATK] will greatly rise.
203_ItemDescription/1018: Increases the [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_PHYSICAL] for dual wield and katana.
203_ItemDescription/1019: Increases the [STATS:CRITICAL_DMG_PHYSICAL] for dual wield and katana.
203_ItemDescription/1020: The efficiency of the axe increases.
203_ItemDescription/1021: The efficiency of the pickaxe increases.
203_ItemDescription/1023: Gain a chance to sometimes catch two fish when you catch a fish.
203_ItemDescription/1024: Gain a chance to not consume consumables when using it.
203_ItemDescription/1025: Gain a chance to not consume food when eating.
203_ItemDescription/1026: Gain a chance to received enhanced effects from the food you eat.
203_ItemDescription/1027: When you get low on [STATS:SP], the [STATS:ATK] increases.
203_ItemDescription/1030: Dash forward by pressing the crouch button midair. It's so exhausting that you lose a bit of [STATS:SP].
203_ItemDescription/1031: When you melee attack an ally player, the [STATS:ATK] and [STATS:MATK] for both players will increase for a certain period of time. Some ranged attacks can trigger this effect as well.
203_ItemDescription/1032: Restore [STATS:HP] when a buff is applied.
203_ItemDescription/1033: When you block a long-range attack, your [STATS:MP] gets slightly restored.
203_ItemDescription/1036: Gain the ability to fish anywhere.
203_ItemDescription/1037: When you eat raw Animal Flesh, [STATS:ATK] will increase for a certain period of time.
203_ItemDescription/1038: Gain increased invincibility duration after evading.
203_ItemDescription/1039: Throw a sword and teleport yourself to the location of the sword once it hits.
203_ItemDescription/104: A primitive gun. Requires [ITEM:188] to shoot. It seems to have no practical use at all...
203_ItemDescription/1040: This will give you the ability to throw a building.
203_ItemDescription/1041: Your [STATS:HP] will gradually heal while riding the glider.
203_ItemDescription/1042: Your [STATS:ST_CONSUME_RATE] will be lowered while riding the glider.
203_ItemDescription/1043: Your [STATS:DEF] will be slightly higher while riding the glider.
203_ItemDescription/1044: Your [STATS:ST_CONSUME_RATE] will be lowered while cliff climbing.
203_ItemDescription/1045: Lower the [STATS:ST_CONSUME_RATE] of a wall jump.
203_ItemDescription/1046: Jump very high by jumping while crouching.
203_ItemDescription/1047: Your [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_PHYSICAL] increases the more you eat.
203_ItemDescription/1048: When you defeat an enemy, the enemy may further drop an additional item.
203_ItemDescription/1049:
Execute an evading roll with movement + [KEYMAP:DODGE] key.
You are invulnerable during the roll, allowing you to avoid taking damage.
203_ItemDescription/105: A gun equipped with a mechanism for continuous fire. It seems to be a little better than a previous model, though...
203_ItemDescription/1051: When [STATS:SP] is above a certain amount, [STATS:HP] gradually heals.
203_ItemDescription/1052: The number of each item inventory will increase.
203_ItemDescription/1053: When you defeat an enemy, the enemy may additionally drop an item.
203_ItemDescription/1054: Jump height increases with skill level.
203_ItemDescription/1055:
When receiving a lethal strike with a certain amount of [STATS:HP], you will remain alive with 1 [STATS:HP]. Spends [STATS:SP] upon activating.
Remains in cooldown after activated until you respawn after death or resting at a bed for a certain period of time.
203_ItemDescription/1057: Reduce [STATS:ST_CONSUME_RATE] of the actions that consume [STATS:ST] over a period of time.
203_ItemDescription/1058: Crouch + [KEYMAP:MELEE] executes a spin attack. Holding [KEYMAP:MELEE] keeps you spinning as you consume [STATS:ST]. Your [STATS:ATK] increases the longer you spin, but depletes your Satiety Point.
203_ItemDescription/1059: A powerful, single-handed sword slash that can be activated by holding the attack button. You will become momentarily invicible at the moment of activation.
203_ItemDescription/1060: Strenghen the shield attack to increase its damage and extend the stun duration of it.
203_ItemDescription/1061: Your charged bow attacks increase in damage.
203_ItemDescription/1062: When you successfully shield bash an enemy attack, the [STATS:ATK] of the next attack will increase.
203_ItemDescription/1063: Your attack with Katana will partially ignore the hardness of mobs' body parts. The softer, the less effective this skill will be.
203_ItemDescription/1064: Every consequent spell cast will increase in damage until you receive damage.
203_ItemDescription/1065: Your melee attacks deal more damage every time you melee attack, until you receive damage.
203_ItemDescription/1066: Periodically, your melee attack from behind will be critical and deal more damage.
203_ItemDescription/1067: Further increases the damage of the bow's normal attack.
203_ItemDescription/1068: Gain a chance to obtain additional wood when chopping natural trees.
203_ItemDescription/1069: Gain a chance to obtain additional rocks when mining natural stones.
203_ItemDescription/107: This single-shot gun is the most effective at medium to long range. Requires [ITEM:190] to shoot. Since it is recreated based on lost information from a long time ago, the internal structure seems to be different from the original one...
203_ItemDescription/1070: Gain a chance to obtain additional [STATS:MONEY] when defeating enemies.
203_ItemDescription/1071: Gain a chance to retrieve a portion of the building's materials when constructing a building. Materials of Rank 8 (with 8 Stars) or higher and some items cannot be retrieved.
203_ItemDescription/1072: Gain a chance to obtain a gacha coin when constructing a building.
203_ItemDescription/1073: Gain a chance to find an item randomly when swimming. The item has a chance of coming with a rare enchantment.
203_ItemDescription/1074: Gain a chance to obtain additional rewards from treasure chests.
203_ItemDescription/1076: Greatly increases the effect of cooked food.
203_ItemDescription/1077: Gain a chance to find an item when you consume food. The higher item rank of the food, the more likely to find the enchanted item.
203_ItemDescription/1078: Shortens the time needed to craft and to repair an item in your inventory.
203_ItemDescription/1079: Decrease the amount of [STATS:MONEY] required when you purchase, repair an item, or improve breed.
203_ItemDescription/1081: Lessens the durability decrease of your vehicles.
203_ItemDescription/1084: Increase bare hands' [STATS:ATK], [STATS:MOTION_SPEED] and [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_PHYSICAL] when you aren't equipped with Head Equipment.
203_ItemDescription/1085: Increase bare hands' [STATS:ATK], [STATS:MOVEMENT_SPEED] and [STATS:CRITICAL_DMG_PHYSICAL] when you aren't equipped with Body Equipment.
203_ItemDescription/1086: Increase Melee Attack Damage and [STATS:MOVEMENT_SPEED] when you're in the state of Stealth.
203_ItemDescription/1087: Decrease the chance of losing the maximum durability of items when you repair them from the inventory.
203_ItemDescription/1088: Increase EXP you gain from gathering items.
203_ItemDescription/1089: Mana will recover up to a certain ratio when you're out of combat. The less current Mana, the more it recovers.
203_ItemDescription/1090: Every melee attack grants you the buff that increases damage of magic attack skills. When you cast a magic attack skill, the buff will be gone.
203_ItemDescription/1091: Every melee attack shortens the cooldown of magic skills.
203_ItemDescription/1092: You can consume Explosive Barrels from your inventory to drop it by [KEYMAP:AIM] while riding the glider. It may not be consumed sometimes.
203_ItemDescription/1093: Trains your pets to slightly increase [STATS:EXP] they gain.
203_ItemDescription/1094: Increase the chance of capturing monsters with Monster Prisms.
203_ItemDescription/1095: Your pets in the inventory recover faster.
203_ItemDescription/1096: Evoke the wild in your pets to slightly increase their [STATS:ATK].
203_ItemDescription/1097: Evoke the wild in your pets to slightly increase their [STATS:MAX_HP].
203_ItemDescription/1098: Train your pets efficiently to drastically increase [STATS:EXP] they gain.
203_ItemDescription/1099: Recall of the wild drastically increases [STATS:ATK] of your pets.

203_ItemDescription/1107: Decreases ATK penalty due to the weight of a shield.

203_ItemDescription/1312: This dish can be cooked with whatever is left in a fridge. All you need to do is chop and fry them. It is hard to maintain the same taste every time you cook since the ingredients can be different.

203_ItemDescription/2220: Strong and delicious for freshwater fish that are farmed all over the world. It has a unique ecology that grow to hide the children in the parent's mouth.
203_ItemDescription/2221: I grew up in the ocean born in the river, or fish that come back to the rivers to spawn. Since the fish that got the oil in a large-scale returns to the spawning season, also known as a tradition of the season.
203_ItemDescription/2222: Living fossil, known as a giant fish. Not aware that he had made to the body of the fossil. Resulting in drowning sink and notice that your body has become stone.
203_ItemDescription/2223: Natural tuna is a luxury, it is well known that general to enter the hand is a descendant of chemically synthesized cyber tuna escaped.
203_ItemDescription/2224: Luxury fish called mahi mahi. Because of the fish there is a power in the muscular, it is necessary to open the muscle power when caught. Eat and good for muscle.
203_ItemDescription/2225: Good luck fish indispensable to the New Year. Is said to Shusseuo, the name is changed in accordance with the growth. Since the war even call it by that name occurs, safe to match the opponent.
203_ItemDescription/2226: Large fish of silver white. Is exactly exile who like to taste alone swim there as lonely at large. Sessha the giant trevally. The bamboo basket is flowing.
203_ItemDescription/2227: Shape the fish, such as the elongated sword. To a certain pull how the power of choice to anglers. Sashimi of bland flavor are preferred in passing.
203_ItemDescription/2228: Marlin with a very long dorsal fin. Fellow of the marlin has a long upper jaw, such as a spear to the nose. To the strong pull, such as pulling each ship, it is preferred by anglers.
203_ItemDescription/2229: Large marlin. Has an upper jaw that extends very far, much like a spear. Known to turn to a bright blue color when dying.
203_ItemDescription/2230: Fish with a long upper jaw, such as a spear in the nose reminiscent of a double-edged sword, such as Gradius. Sometimes I rush to pierce the upper jaw.
203_ItemDescription/2231: The largest known turtle. Instead of their shell, their back is covered by their skin. Very proficient at diving deep, and feeds on jellyfishes in the deep sea.
203_ItemDescription/2232: This fish has fatal toxins beneath the heavenly taste. Fishers hate them because they destroy fishing traps with their sharp teeth and bite the bait incessantly. If you avoid the poisonous part of the pufferfish, you will enjoy the taste of bliss, but it's also a clever trap to make you eat the toxins.
203_ItemDescription/2233: This fish has lots of pointy spines. Despite its humorous appearance, fishers hate this fish because it bends the hook with its strong teeth and takes the bait away. However, there are some areas where people like to eat this fish. They say it's surprisingly tasty.
203_ItemDescription/2307: Amulet of blazing blood. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2308: Amulet of warm compassion. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2309: Amulet of piercing cold. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2324: This accessory can block external high temperatures. The fairy inside of this charm doesn't like hot-blooded bad youth but cold-blooded beauty with the evil eyes and beauty with the magical plants. As a result, this charm grants you a heat resistance effect and reduces resistance to cold and poison.
203_ItemDescription/2338: Amulet of blazing blood. Increase the resistance to hot biomes when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2339: Amulet of warm compassion. Increase the resistance to poisonous biomes when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2340: Amulet of piercing cold. Increase the resistance to cold biomes when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2341: Amulet of blazing blood. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2342: Amulet of warm compassion. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2343: Amulet of piercing cold. Beneficial when equipped.
203_ItemDescription/2344: When you wear this choker, the heat is not a thing anymore because of the blazing blood. Additionally, you'll be able to absorb a life when you attack. Warming your neck is believed to be a good way to protect you from the cold, though, will you still need to care a temperature outside when your blood is blazingly hot as magma?
203_ItemDescription/2345: When you wear this choker, the poison is not a thing anymore because of the antibody. Additionally, you'll be able to absorb a life when you attack. You'll get tiny sprinters around your neck, and they'll inject antibodies into you. That's why you feel prickly whenever you wear this.
203_ItemDescription/2346: When you wear this choker, the coldness is not a thing because it'll help you calm down deeply. Additionally, you'll be able to absorb a life when you attack. The calmness will allow you to separate your body senses from your consciousness, and you'll become a fan of long johns and stomach bands.
203_ItemDescription/2347: When you wear this bracelet, the heat is not a thing anymore because of the blazing blood. Additionally, your bows will deal increased damage. Warming your neck is believed to be a good way to protect you from the cold, though, will you still need to care a temperature outside when your blood is blazingly hot as magma?
203_ItemDescription/2348: When you wear this bracelet, the poison is not a thing anymore because of the antibody. Additionally, your bows will deal increased damage. You'll get tiny sprinters around your neck, and they'll inject antibodies into you. That's why you feel prickly whenever you wear this.

The calmness will allow you to separate your body senses from your consciousness, and you'll become a fan of long johns and stomach bands.
203_ItemDescription/2350: When you wear these earrings, the heat is not a thing anymore because of the blazing blood. Additionally, your skills will consume less amount of mana. Protecting your ears from frostbites is necessary under the extreme coldness, though, will you still need to care a temperature outside when your blood is blazingly hot as magma?
203_ItemDescription/2351: When you wear these earrings, the poison is not a thing anymore because of the antibody. Additionally, your skills will consume less amount of mana. The stimulation from the pierce holes will help you have the antibody. That's why you feel prickly whenever you wear this.
203_ItemDescription/2352: When you wear these earrings, the coldness is not a thing because it'll help you calm down deeply. Additionally, your skills will consume less amount of mana. The calmness will allow you to separate your body senses from your consciousness, and you'll become a fan of long johns and stomach bands.
203_ItemDescription/2367: You can feel the icy coldness in this earring. If you are experienced enough to wear this, it's not impossible to dash mid-air when the forces of jumping and falling are perfectly balanced.
203_ItemDescription/2391: Slightly decrease your attack speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2392: Considerably decrease your attack speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2393: Drastically decrease your attack speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2394: Slightly decrease your movement speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2395: Considerably decrease your movement speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2396: Drastically decrease your movement speed when equipped. There are no benefits, though.

203_ItemDescription/2398: Considerably decrease your jumping power when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2399: Drastically decrease your jumping power when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2400: Drastically decrease your attack speed, movement speed, and jumping power when equipped. There are no benefits, though.
203_ItemDescription/2401: Great pillar of ancient civilization.The pillar is decorated with countless reliefs of nameless gods, but bits and pieces have weathered away.
203_ItemDescription/2402: A tablet carved in with poetry praising god. If you wish for growth and offer this tablet in front of the Anubis on a floating island, you will be granted abilities beyond human capabilities.
203_ItemDescription/2404: A tablet carved in with poetry praising god. If you wish for growth and offer this tablet in front of the Anubis on a floating island, you will be granted abilities beyond human capabilities. However, you need to grow up to a certain point before doing this.
203_ItemDescription/2451: The most basic building block for machines. With its involute tooth profile, it allows for continuous power transmission.
203_ItemDescription/2452: Bioethanol. It can be made from wheat.
203_ItemDescription/2453: Beautiful crystals that are also called quartz. Transmits a unique frequency when electricity is applied, which could be used as a reference for clocks.
203_ItemDescription/2454: Very versatile cellulose fibers that could be woven or burned. Conveniently, a biproduct when producing rice.
203_ItemDescription/2455: Stretchy material obtained from fruits of the Gomu Gomu tree. When consumed by mouth, through thermodynamic entropy elasticity, you become a rubber man.
203_ItemDescription/2456: A natural resin. Though it is said that they are formed from the remains of a tiger, in reality they are the source of energy for a certain magical, chemical, Japanese style apron maid.
203_ItemDescription/2457: The wisdom of human beings invented this item which you can use to externalize and propagate your thoughts. It can also be used as an excellent packaging material. Some are used for packing ammunition.
203_ItemDescription/2458: There are many ways to utilize this fat which is solid at room temperature. It is waterproof when applied to paper, reduces friction when applied to parts, burns well when set on fire.
203_ItemDescription/2459: This plastic is reinforced with sugar cane fibers. We thought it would be a great ecological idea to utilize the waste after extracting sugar, but the mixed fibers make recycling hard. It was great when I first thought of it, though.
203_ItemDescription/2460: This crystal is believed to be a crystal of the elemental spirit. It can be used to activate various magic items. It lasts long enough that you can forget to replace this activator regularly, but it breaks down faster than most of the magic items. You may fail to activate a magic item at a critical moment because of this.
203_ItemDescription/2461: The story contained in this item will encourage you passionately. Just by reading the records of the men and women who continue to spin endlessly like a spiral, you'll feel energetic. If you craft an item based on this, it will be an item of Passion.
203_ItemDescription/2462: The story contained in this item will strengthen your mind. The record of those who had fought against pathogens shows the importance of the devotion to descendants. If you craft an item based on this, it will be an item of Immunity.
203_ItemDescription/2463: The story contained in this item will calm you down deeply. The records of the men who made tough decisions and collapsed in the extreme cold will bring clarity to your mind just by reading them. If you craft an item based on this, it will be an item of Cold-blood.
203_ItemDescription/2471: A memory piece of a man who was said to be a bloodsucker. He had tried to research a blood-borne disease but was not understood and ended up being called a vampire. The man never gained anyone's understanding, but he lived his life without being ostracized by those around him.
203_ItemDescription/2472: A memory piece of the archer of the magic bullet. The record said he devoted his life to improving his archery. It has been passed down from generation to generation, but it gets lost and is occasionally found in unexpected places as time goes by.
203_ItemDescription/2473: A memory piece of the great mage with the magical power of ice and fire. The scribbles of him passed down most of his skills and aspirations to his disciples, and it became the driving force behind striking the Great Demon King. Sometimes forgotten scribbles like this can be found.
203_ItemDescription/248: Cook various dishes by combining various food items. Some food items provide beneficial buffs. Progressing in Age can unlock more recipes.
203_ItemDescription/2491: A rubber boot with a huge hole in the sole. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2492: A tattered old tire. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2493: A rusty empty can. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2494: A dusty copper coin from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2495: A distorted silver coin from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2496: A dark red gold coin from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2497: A dirty bag full of copper coins from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2498: A damaged bag full of silver coins from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2499: A discolored bag full of gold coins from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2500: A gem sealed with the cursed power. There seem no other ways to use it except for exchange for cash...
203_ItemDescription/2501: An embellished cape. It is also known as Inverness cape and used to protect oneself from wind and snow.
203_ItemDescription/2502: An embellished cape. It is also known as Inverness cape and used to protect oneself from wind and snow.
203_ItemDescription/2503: An embellished cape. It's worn to protect one's shoulders but it's also important as a part of an attire.
203_ItemDescription/2504: An embellished cape. It's worn to protect one's shoulders but it's also important as a part of an attire.
203_ItemDescription/2505: A light-weighted armor that has been fortified with thin metal material and leather. The defense power is not very high but it doesn't get in the way of your movement.
203_ItemDescription/2506: A light-weighted armor that has been fortified with thin metal material and leather. The defense power is not very high but it doesn't get in the way of your movement.
203_ItemDescription/2507: A light-weighted armor that has been fortified with thin metal material and leather. The defense power is not very high but it doesn't get in the way of your movement.
203_ItemDescription/2508: A light-weighted armor that has been fortified with thin metal material and leather. The defense power is not very high but it doesn't get in the way of your movement.
203_ItemDescription/2509: Plain clothing made of fabric reinforced with leather belts. Widely used by beginners and seasoned adventurers alike. However, for a ninja who finds themselves facing off against Sherman tanks or engaging in intense brawls, this lightweight clothing probably won't do much good...
203_ItemDescription/2510: Plain clothing made of fabric reinforced with leather belts. Widely used by beginners and seasoned adventurers alike. However, for a ninja who finds themselves facing off against Sherman tanks or engaging in intense brawls, this lightweight clothing probably won't do much good...
203_ItemDescription/2519: Very effective in a Hell biome.

203_ItemDescription/260: This will allow you to create head gears. If you're conscious of your fashion style, start with your head!
203_ItemDescription/272: This will allow you to create short-range weapons, bows, and protective gears. You should start with basic equipments. Each accessory has various effects.
203_ItemDescription/273: A higher level blacksmith that can craft more items than its previous version. Blacksmithing, which used to be done by hand, has evolved with machine tools such as lathes that are precise enough to establish the concept of interchangeability and forging hammers that have an output that cannot be reached by human power. However, if you take a look, you will find fairies working overtime inside, so it may not have evolved essentially.
203_ItemDescription/275: This new workbench is created as a result of a merging between a hatter and a blacksmith. It seems you can craft head equipment and body equipment on this workbench.
203_ItemDescription/284: This will allow you to get milk, egg, and other products from your livestock. The items you can obtain from keeping livestock vary. It seems to start working once you throw a monster prism of captured mobs into the top part of it as long as it has feedstock.
203_ItemDescription/2905: The basic stats of this glider is completely the same as the normal glider, but the required items to craft are different. You know what I mean, right?
203_ItemDescription/293: You can create a new life by mating two animals. Observe the miracle of life and celebrate the joining of a new friend to your party. It seems to start working once you throw a monster prism of captured mobs into the top part of it.
203_ItemDescription/294: You can create a new life by mating two animals. Observe the miracle of life and celebrate the joining of a new friend to your party.
203_ItemDescription/295: You can create a new life by mating two animals. Observe the miracle of life and celebrate the joining of a new friend to your party.
203_ItemDescription/296: Used to grow and harvest wheat. You must first use a [ITEM:248][//cooking pot] to create flour before you can eat it.
203_ItemDescription/3000: A barricade that bounces off the intruders. It's rather traditional, but it's effective against the enemies.
203_ItemDescription/308: The farming plot allows you to create various kinds of crops. You will need crop seeds and plenty of water to start with the cultivation.
203_ItemDescription/3101: The weakest weapon. A veteran adventurer would know that the length of 10 feet is sufficient.
203_ItemDescription/3102: A single-sided sword that sailors love to use. Because they didn't wear heavy armors on ships, cutlasses were used to cut through the thin protection they had.
203_ItemDescription/3103: An axe with explosives set inside the blade. Once it explodes, it will affect everyone including the axe user, so this weapon preferred by a battle-crazy warrior who's not afraid of sacrifices.
203_ItemDescription/3104: A sword that bends curves from the middle of its blade. Its unique form made to crack open heads influenced the development of curved swords such as scimitar and harpe.
203_ItemDescription/3105: It is said that you can only earn this sword if you are chosen by a great spirit. According to the legend, the owner of this sword can gain the blessings from the god of fire.
203_ItemDescription/3106: A short sword that was used also as a shield in Western combats. It was used to fend off enemy attacks.
203_ItemDescription/3107: To reach the heights of a master, gratefulness is required. You can silently attack by straightening out your emotions before you pray and swing the weapon.
203_ItemDescription/3108: A uniquely shaped sword that tribes of hunters love to use. It has a razor-sharp edge and a thickness of a hatchet so that it can be used for hunting and butchering.
203_ItemDescription/3109: A sword with a crossguard that has a peculiar shape. A legend states that the gap is able to swallow anything, giving it the name of the primordial void created by the gods.
203_ItemDescription/3110: A sword that glows with the power of the force. Don't think, feel.
203_ItemDescription/3111: A sword that enshrines the elephant-headed god. Those who earn the blessings can understand ten times more information from one thing they hear.
203_ItemDescription/3112: Cane monk that contains the scholarship is used when guiding the congregation. Shepherd has been made to lead the congregation has been an ideal, and stand out from every form so as to guide the sheep.
203_ItemDescription/3113: Battleaxe also used as a throwing weapon. The center of the gravity leans heavily towards its blade to reliably strike the enemy with its blade when thrown.
203_ItemDescription/3114: An ancient sword that has been passed down through generations of people from the desert lands. Its blade shines coldly like the desert night yet one can feel the hellish passion through its design.
203_ItemDescription/3115: Bond is proud knight, one of darkness equipment produced by the fall in the darkness. By aligning the darkness equipment, it is possible to obtain a more powerful force.
203_ItemDescription/3116: Kusarigama of form that famous kusarigama diction that innocent Ittosai was used. The movement is misleading what you see freely protean.
203_ItemDescription/3117: A sword that's a good size for a child to wield. There are many heroic warriors who have gone out to the world with the same type of sword.
203_ItemDescription/3118: Sword with the heavy infantry of the great empire that began from a small city. The sword was used in all of the war through the rise and fall of the empire.
203_ItemDescription/3119: One-handed sword with a short blade. Since it is easy to handle and agile movement, so often bear the unexpected Fukade. In addition, it is possible to give a mortal wound by wield in Misadame sneak a To partner carefully.
203_ItemDescription/3120: A machete created to cut down flowers and beat off the tree branches. Because it's made for daily usage, it's easy to manipulate. Its heaviness makes it a great weapon for decapitation.
203_ItemDescription/3121: A straight sword with a broad blade. Those who have been well trained with its use can wield it with high speed but those who are unskilled can be wielded by the sword instead.
203_ItemDescription/3122: A type of curved sword that was once used by the camel-riding knights of an empire in the desert. Because of the hard work, the empire enjoyed a long, prosperous era.
203_ItemDescription/3123: Sword nobility use in a duel. In order better to shed blood is lost, it was often to adopt a rule that, thin blade to the limit were preferred for the lightly quick attack.
203_ItemDescription/3124: A short sword that Scottish Highlanders used. It has a high critical hit rate.
203_ItemDescription/3125: One half of the Lizzardman's boss's double-edged axe. The blade is processed with special chemicals.
