203_ItemDescription/3162: A type of curved sword that was once used by the camel-riding knights of an empire in the desert. Because of the hard work, the empire enjoyed a long, prosperous era.
203_ItemDescription/3163: A sword nobles used in their duels. Since their rules often required their opponent to shed blood to win, many preferred the light and thin blade that allowed for quick strikes.
203_ItemDescription/3164: A short sword that Scottish Highlanders used. It has a high critical hit rate.
203_ItemDescription/3165: One of the two double-edged axes the lizardman boss wields. The blade is processed with special chemicals.
203_ItemDescription/3179: The chilling liquid is applied to the tip of this arrow. It will give stacks of "Chill" effect to an enemy hit.
203_ItemDescription/3180: The freezing liquid is applied to the tip of this arrow. It will give stacks of "Frost" effect to an enemy hit.
203_ItemDescription/3181: The poison is applied to the tip of this arrow. It can be injected directly into the circulatory system through the wound. You can use this arrow for hunting, but not for your own species. You will be accused of cowardice.
203_ItemDescription/3182: What awaits you after escaping from Hydra is hell again. When you mix lust and violence in the land of the dead, the poison of Sodom, Cows, Monos, Craftopian Association, and chaos, all in a concrete mixer, you can make this Venomous Arrow.
203_ItemDescription/3184: The paralyzing liquid is applied to the tip of this arrow. It will give stacks of "Electro" effect to an enemy hit.
203_ItemDescription/3190: No dogs can resist this offering. The land of milk and honey or the paradise they got exiled from couldn't make them happy anymore. They were happier when they were beside the person who's no longer with them. The nostalgic smell that reminds them of the good old days might be a trigger to release the gods' wrath. Dog food is not as tasty as it looks, so it is not good to eat.
203_ItemDescription/3198: The mysterious anti-gravity power of this miracle glove allows you to carry building items that are not snapped to the grid. Right-click to lift an item, then left-click to throw it, or right-click again to put it down.
203_ItemDescription/3200: This magical hammer can repair objects by hitting them. Just as the Steel Demon once caused many towers to rise in the dying city of Dagon, it can give life to any basic substance and restore HP to buildings and vehicles. There is no doubt that blasphemous forces against nature are at work, and the barbarians of Kimmeria may be coming soon.
203_ItemDescription/3201: This convenient rod can retrieve objects. If you hold right-click while equipping this, you'll enter a retrieving mode. While your aim is on placeables, this rod shoots a razor to it. If you left-click while the razor is on placeables, you will retrieve them.
203_ItemDescription/3202: This special machine can shoot the items you set. This can, of course, shoot arrows, but also liquid items or seeds. You can set the interval of shooting as well. There should be more than enough to make use of it. (Some items cannot be set into this machine, though)
203_ItemDescription/3203: This washing machine washes away all sorts of enchantments. The "Dangerous," "Punishing," "Cow's" Cheese, the "Year-round-working," "24-hours-working," "Human's" Generator, and the "Splendid," "Bouncing," Altar of Civilization can be equally washed and lose all of the enchantments.
203_ItemDescription/3215: Facility for repairing your equipment's maximum durability. It seems as if equipments with less than satisfactory maintenance always break when you need them the most. To avoid this, you should always keep your equipments in good shape, but is it still the same item even if you've repeatedly replaced parts of them?
203_ItemDescription/3216: A higher-level repair station can repair items faster. The skilled workers seem to prefer the difficult-to-handle vertical cutting machines and shaping machines to the current mainstream milling machines. By looking at the belt-type power transmission system connected to the void, it may not be easy to distinguish between magic and science.
203_ItemDescription/3227: You can store your money safely in this facility. A deposit equal to the amount of money handled is required for approval to establish the facility, and a 1% fee is charged for withdrawals. The more you place, the more you can store. It may be a more shady business than a store that demands a huge appraisal fee and then sells it the next day at double the price.
203_ItemDescription/3228: When placed, the bank's maximum deposit amount will be increased by 20 million Gs. If the bank is not installed, there is no effect.
203_ItemDescription/3239: This pochette contains tools that assist you in combat. Just because there are more tools than you expected doesn't mean it's connected to the fourth dimension, and losing it doesn't mean the adventure begins.
203_ItemDescription/3240: This pochette contains tools that assist you in combat. The small bottle covered in the practical items holds the record of the bitter youth full of regrets. It's been a long time waiting for the miracle to happen somewhere, someday.
203_ItemDescription/3241: A bar-shaped grinding stone made of hard steel. It quickly and messily scrapes off the oil and rust from the blade and revives its sharpness. If you want to keep cutting your enemies efficiently, you may want to imitate the traditional style of holding a knife in your right hand and a sharpening stick in your left.
203_ItemDescription/3242: An iron plate soaked with numerous grudges. Kneeling is a ritual that is performed by selected people who know pride and shame to apologize only once in their lives. The strength of one's will to keep one's head up, even on a burning iron plate, is of great magical significance.
203_ItemDescription/3243: This special amulet seems to be effective only when you equip two-handed swords...
203_ItemDescription/3244: This special amulet seems to be effective only when you equip two-handed swords...
203_ItemDescription/3290: A practice shell. It's not very powerful, and it doesn't give a numbing sensation when fired, so it's not well received by gunners who only need one shot. Equip this to fire when riding a tank.
203_ItemDescription/3291: A shell for attacking a wide area. You can aim it directly, though; it's fun to aim it indirectly, then guide the enemies into the firing range to hit them. Equip this to fire when riding a tank.
203_ItemDescription/3292: This shell is designed to pierce through thick armor. Colossal monsters and dragons are no exception. Equip this to fire when riding a tank.
203_ItemDescription/3300: A worn out holy sword. The original sword is a sword that holds the power of the stars, but this is an original-like replica. It still glows because of the mystical power of the original, but it will soon be empty, leaving no trace of it behind.
203_ItemDescription/3301: A worn out magic sword. It once used to be a strangely twisted sword, but now there is no trace of its unique features. It still glows because of the mystical power of the original, but it will soon be empty, leaving no trace of it behind.
203_ItemDescription/3302: A worn out demonic sword. It was originally an inseparable twin sword, but now only one half remains. It still glows because of the mystical power of the original, but it will soon be empty, leaving no trace of it behind.
203_ItemDescription/3303: A worn out katana. It was originally a katana with a very long blade, but now it is broken and shortened. It still glows because of the mystical power of the original, but it will soon be empty, leaving no trace of it behind.
203_ItemDescription/332: The well creates some water every fixed period of time. It takes a while to retrieve the water from the well so if you're in a hurry, use a bucket.
203_ItemDescription/3321: You will mount this turret on a large slewing ring. As it's designed to be a three-person turret, a full-time loader handles loading, surveillance, staff officer, and vice president as well.
203_ItemDescription/3322: This is the living area of a turret. The captain, who says bullets rarely hit a tank, leans out of the hatch to check circumstances, but if the crew members worry about the captain, he retreats a bit for the crew.
203_ItemDescription/3323: This barrel supports various ammunition types. This Otto's best-seller has been used as a Merara tank gun and as a Boxer robot gun.
203_ItemDescription/3324: The body part of a tank is necessary for driving. As long as the frame is solid and robust, you can mount either a rotating turret, a fixed turret, or a modified kit.
203_ItemDescription/3325: This is the living area for a communicator and a pilot. The pilot really wants to have a side-under-mirror to peek its surroundings through the small gaps in the narrow tank.
203_ItemDescription/3326: These parts form the continuous track. It is recommended to replace the tracks with the ones of your choice, such as those made of alloy suitable for driving on rough terrain or those made of rubber that will not damage the road surfaces.
203_ItemDescription/3327: This fang of the snake is venomous. This poison could kill anybody with a 1/8 probability when the world used to be run on 8 bits. It becomes weaker and weaker, so now we only use it as a material.
203_ItemDescription/3328: This beautiful flower petal is the final form of the maiden who was seduced by spirits. Her noble ideals and her honorable courage have vanished like the scattering flowers. But she still believes in the power of human beings.
203_ItemDescription/3329: This icy material can be obtained from Fenrir when you break all the frozen armor parts of Fenrir. You can craft Earring of Ice Crystal with this material. It has a grayish-blue shimmer and makes you feel a piercing coldness and isolated strength.
203_ItemDescription/333: This facility pumps up water and purifies it. It can produce water more efficiently than wells, but it won't work unless the pipe is connected to a river or the ocean.
203_ItemDescription/3330: This leftover pumpkin from Halloween is ornamental and too bitter to eat. Even if you soak it in a large bottle of wine, it doesn't taste good. Just give it up.
203_ItemDescription/3331: This beautiful petal can remind some of the romantic storms of old times, the island that never withers, or youthful days in school life.
203_ItemDescription/3332: These colored fallen leaves can make you feel a sense of burning beauty and gentle harvest. Let's take a share of the harvest from nature without making the god of harvest angry.
203_ItemDescription/3333: These colored fallen leaves make you feel a sense of beauty and loneliness at the same time. The gods have fallen in love with the magnificent beauty of nature. No words can't describe it.
203_ItemDescription/3334: Hydra's reversed scales are valuable. Even obedient dragons will kill human beings when they touch their reversed scales. It is easier to collect Hydra's reversed scales since they have more heads than other dragons.
203_ItemDescription/3335: This reversed scale is taken from the enraged Hydra that has been addicted to poison. Human monarchs also have their reversed scales, so avoiding them is the key to a successful life.
203_ItemDescription/3336: This shard of the cross is found within the body of the worm.
203_ItemDescription/3337: This scale of Fafnir is very valuable.
203_ItemDescription/3338: This shard of the helmet is found within the body of the worm.
203_ItemDescription/3349: When the summer comes, Monos start collecting these gun parts, but we don't know why. You can craft Water Gun with these parts, but the parts can be obtained only in summer.
203_ItemDescription/335: If you place it into the water, you can catch Marine Products other than fish. You may get something else sometimes...?
203_ItemDescription/3350: This fluid can be extracted from King Mono. It's said to be tears shed for the citizens or bloodshed when Monos fight for the citizens. However, judging from their carefree behaviors, we can only assume that this fluid is drooling while taking a nap.
203_ItemDescription/3351: A shell protects various creatures from the threats of the outside world. Many creatures have hard and strong shells to protect the soft parts of their bodies, but they are often used by other creatures. Every country has an anecdote about a man who rented a house for the night and had the house taken from him.
203_ItemDescription/3352: Rare material which can be used to craft equipment.
203_ItemDescription/3353: Dragon scales are rare materials for crafting equipment. Their lightweight and hardness can be used to produce fine weapons and armors. Moreover, since dragons are enormous creatures, once they are defeated, factories and villages will be built to gather, process, and sell their materials. This will revitalize logistics and provide job opportunities for delivery persons. In other words, defeating dragons is an effective measure against unemployment.
203_ItemDescription/3354: Executioner scales are rare materials for crafting equipment. Only the elite and honored can have these scales. Their strength is very high due to their usual condition of healths. They probably consumed a well-balanced diet of vegetables and insects, avoiding mealworms because of their high-fat content, and never missed a dusting when eating crickets.
203_ItemDescription/3355: These scales are rarely dropped by reapers. Reapers often have their roots in the deep sea, so scales inherited from their ancestors may grow in hidden parts. If you touch their scales, you may be forced to marry them.
203_ItemDescription/3356: This is a small fragment of a meteorite that very rarely falls from the sky. It can be used to craft rare items.
203_ItemDescription/3357: This is a fragment of a meteorite that very rarely falls from the sky. It can be used to craft rare items.
203_ItemDescription/3358: This is a large fragment of a meteorite that very rarely falls from the sky. It can be used to craft rare items.
203_ItemDescription/3360: This red vegetable grows in hell. The one planted by demons, grown in disgust, harvested by evil men, is said to be the spiciest of all. This is one of the essential ingredients for hell-flavored potions. You'd better behave as the devil does in hell if you'd like to have this.
203_ItemDescription/3361: This stone is always faintly warm. It does not generate heat but blocks heat. You can use this behavior to craft heat-resistant equipment, but the heat blocking behavior is the hobby of the fairies; you must check the resistance carefully when using it, or they will betray you.
203_ItemDescription/3362: You can obtain this wood in hell. Because the more blood it sucks, the more it burns, high-class demons prefer to make furniture out of this material. If a demon offers you a chair, it would be best not to sit on it carelessly. You can't predict and prepare enough before the demonic offers.
203_ItemDescription/3367: The cooling of viscous magma forms this rock. There are traces of magma flowing through the ground, and volcanologists or geologists can determine the origin and crystal structure. The technique of tearing the whole area to pieces with an iron ball is named after this rock.
203_ItemDescription/3368: This rock is one of the olivines sometimes produced from the ground when the lava erupts. It's also treated as a gemstone and looks good on a sexy team.
203_ItemDescription/3369: This extraordinary stone found near a lava tube has the Widmanstätten structure. With all of the objective data, we can conclude that it can only be obtained after a million years of cooling, not from lava, but from beyond the sky.
203_ItemDescription/3370: This solid hydrogen oxide forms beautiful transparent crystals. They are as cold as the frozen heart of a chilled maiden. It has a wide range of uses, from a catalyst for magical cold swords to a cold resistance potion.
203_ItemDescription/3371: This is a chunk of snow. If someone is rolling snow, I will help them roll it and leave when it's done. I want to be that kind of adult.
203_ItemDescription/3372: This is the bone meal of gigantic creatures. It can be sintered to make parts that do not wear down or used as a magical power sensor due to its high magical conductivity.
203_ItemDescription/3373: This part has a complex structure. There are cracks in places, but they seem to heal themselves with proper treatment. A cycle of excavation from the mountain has been established.
203_ItemDescription/3374: These special parts are made with the technology from the lost generation. It seems you can use this when you craft a weapon.
203_ItemDescription/3389: This old rag has been soaked in seawater for very long time.
203_ItemDescription/3390: This crystal is made by coagulating various items. It seems that you can recycle it into other items.
203_ItemDescription/3391: This fluid is extracted from various items. It seems that you can recycle it into other items.
203_ItemDescription/3392: This powder is made by destroying various items. It seems that you can recycle it into other items.
203_ItemDescription/3393: This fiber is made by compounding various items. It seems that you can recycle it into other items.
203_ItemDescription/3400: A tearable cloth made from straw. Even though it's a poorly made piece of fabric, those who know how to utilize it can make it into a work of art or a tool of deception.
203_ItemDescription/3401: This solid fabric is often used to repair and preserve machinery. To someone with a paintbrush, it looks like a mass of possibilities.
203_ItemDescription/3402: This cloth is made from a mixture of plant-derived fibers and animal-derived fibers. Its production method is mysterious, but mass-produced products can smell like a pot.
203_ItemDescription/3410: A potentially hugely profitable contract made out of charcoal and rags that can be found anywhere. It requires a seemingly endless amount of paperwork to get approved, plus a fee or gratuity every time you do something. Sometimes you might not get a receipt, but if you're grasping for the real thing, it'll be worth every penny.
203_ItemDescription/3415: A hugely profitable contract made out of charcoal and rags that can be found anywhere. Without this contract indicating a special permit, no special building can be built. But be careful. You are not the one who has obtained permission, but the one who owns the contract. Don't play the game; if you lose the bet, the contract will be taken away from you.
203_ItemDescription/3420: This stone contains magical power. The persons who are guided by probability have it in their hands. But beware, you can't draw a gacha nor open a loot box by breaking it.
203_ItemDescription/3430: THE button. Choose an island via Altar of Transportation and use this button to recreate an island. Go ham with the button as the bug that resulted in the destruction of an entire world has already been fixed. Due to the fix mentioned above there is a miniscule chance that you become stuck for 500 million years, but as the button also comes with the function to wipe your memory in that case, it is basically harmless.
203_ItemDescription/3440: Required this as a catalyst when you cast Alchemy.
203_ItemDescription/3445: This material can be used to craft a potion of cold resistance.
203_ItemDescription/3450: Inorganic material with fine particles. The first step to increase the strength is to homogenize the size of the particles. Don't think, shake it.
203_ItemDescription/3451: This stone is high in calcium. It can be used in various fields, from soil improvement to construction materials, soap, and human alchemy.
203_ItemDescription/3452: This ore contains aluminum oxide. It is said that men in white gather near the sea to hoard this ore. They have hungry wives waiting for them at home.
203_ItemDescription/3453: This mineral contains rare elements. When mixed with metallic materials, it changes them dramatically. In other words, it is a kind of spice for metallic materials. It would work well for gold coins circulating in the north.
203_ItemDescription/3454: This red stone can be used to color things red. The wavelength is relatively longer than others, so let's crush this ore slowly. I don't think you can build a circuit with this.
203_ItemDescription/3455: This blue stone can be used to color things blue. The wavelength is relatively shorter than others, so let's crush this ore quickly. I don't think this has something with Atlantis.
203_ItemDescription/3456: This yellow stone can be used to color things yellow. The wavelength is not short nor long, so let's crush this ore at your own pace. I don't think this ore is found in a national park.
203_ItemDescription/3457: You can use as a spray paint if you put this item into a can.
203_ItemDescription/3460: This tube is very precise. If you accidentally hit it, an old fairy holding a wrench will come yelling at you.
203_ItemDescription/3461: This is one of the greatest inventions in the history of humanity. In a world once destroyed like this, redevelopment is worthwhile.
203_ItemDescription/3462: This engine is still a prototype. It has a novel mechanism that looks as if Homo Futuris will have designed it. It occasionally explodes due to the undergoing material technology. Progress requires the shoulders of giants.
203_ItemDescription/3463: This cartridge can store the power of batteries. In order to operate in harsh environments, it requires consuming many batteries produced by various creatures. It's cute, isn't it?
203_ItemDescription/3464: These are custom parts for high-powered engines. When a famous worker in the bicycle shop in hell assembles them, they will twist and turn as if they were alive.
203_ItemDescription/3465: This tank can store fuel inside. Due to leaking fuel, cheap tanks may explode and disperse easily. But this tank is safe even if the ninja, who said Sayonara to a tank, flies to it. That's how it's written in the Kojiki.
203_ItemDescription/3466: This component can amplify and calculate signals. It can calculate any signals as long as they circulate in the circuit. It seems easier to calculate than to grind hard in the game of the ocean.
203_ItemDescription/3467: This armor plate is made of steel sheets which are crafted with a tremendous amount of alloying elements. The details of how it is made are a military secret, but there is a rumor that UFOs will come if you leave lots of limestones.
203_ItemDescription/3468: A genius develops this high tensile strength bolt. It can withstand an unimaginably powerful force. However, when immersed in water, the head falls off. Ciao!
203_ItemDescription/3469: This coil spring is reinforced. When a shape memory alloy gets triggered, it will have a rubber-like superelasticity.
203_ItemDescription/3470: This sintered, highly functional material came into the limelight as a dream material for realizing ultra-high efficiency engines due to its high hardness and heat resistance. However, tank armor and sanitary toilets are the only things that have become popular in reality.
203_ItemDescription/3471: It's called chemicals, though; it doesn't necessarily mean specific materials. You can add them to other various items to change their nature instead. It's really Craftopian liquid.
203_ItemDescription/3472: These various materials seem to be required when you assemble firearms.
203_ItemDescription/3474: Ancient people found this buggy cement. It is made of geopolymer produced by volcanic activities and becomes more durable over time under the sea. This has been known as a highly useful bug technique for a long time.
203_ItemDescription/3475: This building material is plated and corrosion-resistant. The steel material, which is easy to process from deep drawing to welding, is coated with an oxide film that has a sacrificial anti-corrosion effect and is processed into a shape with a high cross-sectional secondary moment to achieve the high strength necessary for weight reduction.
203_ItemDescription/3476: This lightweight pipe is made thin to make it lighter, so it is vulnerable to corrosion. Of course, it was secretly announced with small size letters in the instruction manual. No one knows about it now.
203_ItemDescription/3477: This lightweight structural material is often used when you prioritize its lightweight over the price. I envy the fact that you don't have to worry about the cost you pay, but it seems hard to pay attention to the weight in grams.
203_ItemDescription/3479: This fiber-reinforced plastic is stronger than resin because the fibers have higher elasticity and tensile strength to share the stress. However, if the load is continuously applied, the fibers will break down in a chain reaction and break in no time.
203_ItemDescription/3484: This is an adjusted aluminum alloy. The nerds, of course, know its data and communicate with minimal words to talk about it. They are going like, "2000 is good," "Nice...," "I'm over-wilm-ed by Wilm," "You got me."
203_ItemDescription/3485: This steel material contains rare metals. The chromium and molybdenum are probably the characters you grew up with, the ones who hang on to carbon and stop it at church when it tries to go on a trip, or the ones who lead it to a more stable life.
203_ItemDescription/3486: This alloy can perform something truly amazing when it's triggered. Dispersed metal particles will align to form a shape of memory at high temperatures. The speed of transformation can be comparable to the speed of hiding a book under your bed that you don't want to tell anyone, or the speed of clicking when you hear your parents' footsteps behind.
203_ItemDescription/3487: This alloy is very scientific and made by heating platinum with chemicals at an unconventional temperature. This heating process increased the hardness while maintaining its stability and corrosion resistance.
203_ItemDescription/3488: This alloy is very scientific and made by heating platinum with magical powder at an unconventional temperature. This heating process sealed the power of magic inside the alloy while maintaining its stability and corrosion resistance.
203_ItemDescription/3491: This wood is impregnated with resin to improve its strength and corrosion resistance while retaining its beautiful grain. When this wood was used to build structures, the authenticity of the wood was judged by whether or not a woodpecker could make a hole in it. So construction workers who were skilled in handling woodpeckers were highly valued.
203_ItemDescription/3492: The crystal orientation of this stone is aligned in a direction called grain and exhibits high load-bearing capacity in other directions. However, once it is cracked, it will split in half. You need to be very careful when you handle it.
203_ItemDescription/3500: If you put fish into this facility, it will slice them into fish fillets or extract items from fish. The fish species will vary in the type and the number of fillets produced by this facility.
203_ItemDescription/3501: If you put fish into this facility, it will slice them into fish fillets or extract items from fish. The fish species will vary in the type and the number of fillets produced by this facility.
203_ItemDescription/3502: If you put fish into this facility, it will slice them into fish fillets or extract items from fish. The fish species will vary in the type and the number of fillets produced by this facility.
203_ItemDescription/3503: If you put fish into this facility, it will slice them into fish fillets or extract items from fish. The fish species will vary in the type and the number of fillets produced by this facility.
203_ItemDescription/3504: If you put fish into this facility, it will slice them into fish fillets or extract items from fish. The fish species will vary in the type and the number of fillets produced by this facility.
203_ItemDescription/3505: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it will extract the seeds out of them. You cannot miss this facility if you want to build up massive farms.
203_ItemDescription/3506: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it will extract the seeds out of them. You cannot miss this facility if you want to build up massive farms.
203_ItemDescription/3507: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it will extract the seeds out of them. You cannot miss this facility if you want to build up massive farms.
203_ItemDescription/3508: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it will extract the seeds out of them. You cannot miss this facility if you want to build up massive farms.
203_ItemDescription/3509: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it will extract the seeds out of them. You cannot miss this facility if you want to build up massive farms.
203_ItemDescription/3510: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it may produce the seed of higher grade plants. Please note that failure is the mother of success.
203_ItemDescription/3511: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it may produce the seed of higher grade plants. Please note that failure is the mother of success.
203_ItemDescription/3512: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it may produce the seed of higher grade plants. Please note that failure is the mother of success.
203_ItemDescription/3513: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it may produce the seed of higher grade plants. Please note that failure is the mother of success.
203_ItemDescription/3514: If you put harvested crops into this facility, it may produce the seed of higher grade plants. Please note that failure is the mother of success.
203_ItemDescription/3515: You can use this facility to restrain enemies. It cannot restrain a large enemy unless they are weakened. If you attach 4 chains to them, you can capture them with a monster prism. You don't need to mess with chains all the time in order to use it. They will forgive you even if you friendly-fire.
203_ItemDescription/3516: You can use this facility to keep a captured monster. When a monster is washed in this facility, they will accept you as an owner and they will forget all their past. They will follow any orders you'll give. Any orders.
203_ItemDescription/3518: The table for the guests. It would be best if you observed diplomatic protocol here. If you make a mistake, the guest will leave the room with apologies for having an unexpected appointment, and you will never see them again.
203_ItemDescription/3550: You can use this gate to measure time from passing through the gate to passing through it again.
203_ItemDescription/356: If you melt the ore in a furnace, you can create an ingot. Ingot is priced higher than an ore.
203_ItemDescription/3600: This potion can heal you and the allies around you by a certain percentage.
203_ItemDescription/3601: This potion can increase the strength of you and the allies around you for a short period of time.
203_ItemDescription/3602: This potion can heal the pets around you.
203_ItemDescription/3604: This potion can heal you a percentage of your Life. It's not so useful when your Lv is low, but the higher your Lv, the more useful it becomes.
203_ItemDescription/3605: This potion can heal you a percentage of your Mana. It's not so useful when your Lv is low, but the higher your Lv, the more useful it becomes.
203_ItemDescription/3606: This potion can heal you a percentage of your Life. It's not so useful when your Lv is low, but the higher your Lv, the more useful it becomes.
203_ItemDescription/3607: This potion can heal you a percentage of your Mana. It's not so useful when your Lv is low, but the higher your Lv, the more useful it becomes.
203_ItemDescription/3630: This potion can restore a large amount of Life. You should drink it all since its quality will start degrading once you open it. You cannot carry lots of them because the empty bottles are unexpectedly large and take lots of space.
203_ItemDescription/3631: This potion can restore a large amount of Mana. You should drink it all since its quality will start degrading once you open it. You cannot carry lots of them because they will resist each other in your inventory.
203_ItemDescription/3632: This potion can restore a large amount of Stamina. You should drink it all since its quality will start degrading once you open it. You cannot carry lots of them because they are tightly packed and sealed due to their terrible taste and smell.
203_ItemDescription/3633: This potion can restore Life and Mana at the same time. You cannot carry lots of them because their bottles are unexpectedly large and resist each other in your inventory.
203_ItemDescription/3660: This basic potion is taught first in Potion Brewery class. Its effect is relatively simple: it restores Life and Mana and removes some pimples.
203_ItemDescription/3661: This basic potion is prescribed as a double dose. It restores Life and Mana and removes some pimples.
203_ItemDescription/3671: This liquid is extracted from red herbs and is full of medicinal properties. You can use this liquid to craft highly effective potions, but drinking this liquid itself is not recommended.
203_ItemDescription/3672: This liquid is extracted from blue herbs and is full of medicinal properties. You can use this liquid to craft highly effective potions, but drinking this liquid itself is not recommended.
203_ItemDescription/3673: This liquid is extracted from yellow herbs and is full of medicinal properties. You can use this liquid to craft highly effective potions, but drinking this liquid itself is not recommended.
203_ItemDescription/3674: This special preparation can give a different effect to a potion when you add it to a potion.
203_ItemDescription/368: This tool had been used to craft textiles, though it's just decorative furniture now since there are no craftable textiles in this world at the moment. Don't let the hope close down until there is the meaning given to this tool again.
203_ItemDescription/3700: This canned spray contains special paint. If you use it, you can color "Canvas Wall". In ancient times, people used to turn streets into dance halls while doing tricks with roller blades with this in their hands.
