203_ItemDescription/3800: This large facility can produce crude oil stably. You can only deploy onto the point of the ocean that has enough depth for it.
203_ItemDescription/3801: A great tombstone. A monument so large that it can be spotted from outer space is surely to be remembered as long as humanity persists.
203_ItemDescription/3802: Monument made of huge stones. A civilization that achieved the ability to freely combine such enormous rocks into these formations are unlikely to be bound by this small planet.
203_ItemDescription/3803: A giant temple dedicated to the gods. Only the most mature social system could afford the constant offerings and festivals.
203_ItemDescription/3804: A house of prayer with history and tradition. The ultimate culmination of culture, with the highest form of art and countless days and nights spent, demonstrates its superiority to its surroundings.
203_ItemDescription/3805: This world heritage seems to be able to generate Enchantments Points over time and to accumulate up to 10 points. However, this effect is not stackable even if you deploy two or more of these buildings on the same island.
203_ItemDescription/3840: An orb fulfilled with souls of Anubis. Many orbs were spread into various places around the world, but their number is way too smaller than the one of souls you've taken from Anubis.
203_ItemDescription/3851: This offering showing the skills dedicated to the gods is required when you progress an Era. It seems that a sword and shield made of minerals and bullion for decoration are needed.
203_ItemDescription/3852: This offering showing the skills dedicated to the gods is required when you progress an Era. It seems that a large amount of bread, meat, and fish are needed.
203_ItemDescription/3853: This offering showing the courage dedicated to the gods is required when you progress an Era. It seems that relics that lie on the fields of meadow, ice fields, deserts, volcanic mountains, and poisonous swamp biomes are needed.
203_ItemDescription/3854: This offering showing the might dedicated to the gods is required when you progress an Era. It seems that tokens that can be obtained by defeating a lizard, a dead spirit, a serpent, a flower spirit, and a mono-eyed king at Lv. 30 or higher are needed.
203_ItemDescription/3856: This offering showing the knowledge dedicated to the gods is required when you progress an Era. It seems that you can obtain this by defeating the three-headed dragon living in the poisonous swamp.
203_ItemDescription/3861: This relic seems to be left behind by the people who once lived on the meadow. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3862: This relic seems to be left behind by the people who once lived on the volcanic mountain. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3863: This relic seems to be left behind by the people who once lived in the ice field. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3864: This relic seems to be left behind by the people who once lived in the desert. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3865: This relic seems to be left behind by the people who once lived on the poisonous swamp. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3866: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3867: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3868: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3869: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3870: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/3871: This is a token of bravery for defeating a powerful enemy. It could be an offering to the gods or demanded by some collectors.
203_ItemDescription/392: This tool had been used to dry food, though it's just decorative furniture now since there are no craftable dried foods in this world at the moment. Don't let the hope close down until there is the meaning given to this tool again.
203_ItemDescription/3939: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3940: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3941: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3942: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3943: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3944: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3945: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3946: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3947: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3948: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3949: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/395: This table allows you to apply enchantments to items using an Enchanting Scroll as a catalyst. You can only apply enchantments to weapons before, though experimenting with this technology finally allows you to do so with all items.
203_ItemDescription/3950: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3951: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/3952: Use this item to obtain an enchanted Enchanting Scroll. The higher the rank, the rarer enchantments will be applied to the Enchanting Scroll.
203_ItemDescription/4001: A stone wall devised by castle lords. Even ninjas can't get through it! Strong enough to withstand attacks by land or sea.
203_ItemDescription/4002: Wall of a certain hitchhiker's house. Laying infront of this wall might be great for avoiding being crushed by a bulldozer. Letting a hyperspace highway pass and pressing a red button isn't much of a difference.
203_ItemDescription/4003: A single board cut out from Yggdrasil. The gigantic tree ring looks as if it is parellel even when cut in round slice. It was once a holy tree that ws feared by the angels but now, it is a cheap material thanks to the overflowing mana in this world.
203_ItemDescription/4004: A flat board. An absolutely flat wooden board. Reminds you of someone... nevermind. Didn't know Bacura was a material for construction. If there was any impoliteness in this description, we will apologize flat out.
203_ItemDescription/4005: A wall with the same pattern as the ruins of an ancient civilization. The geometric pattern on the wall describes a sophisticated ancient technology that is long forgotten.
203_ItemDescription/4006: Brick wall built by an artisan. It has a mesmerizing geometry, and it is said that you are able to tell various things like the artisan's age or their place of birth just by looking at it.
203_ItemDescription/4007: Patchworked wall that has been repatched numerous times. Due to the space debris creating a hole on the body of the ship in space, it is heavily repatched. Here, the humans are the cause of the hole. In other words, the humans are the debris.
203_ItemDescription/4008: A wall with the same pattern as the ruins of an ancient civilization. The geometric pattern on the wall describes a sophisticated ancient technology that is long forgotten.
203_ItemDescription/4020: This wall makes you want to scribble on it. It has stimulated the creative urge of every artist and preserved all kinds of works by various artists. These walls have remained the same, even after the red button. The masterpieces are called frescoes.
203_ItemDescription/4021: This wall is made of boiling lava pressed into a plate by an unknown force. Players will take damage in contact with this, but other mobs and materials will not be damaged due to the safety measures. What is safety?
203_ItemDescription/4022: You can color this wall by using the item "Spray Paint". The reason why you cannot make the artistic graphics over the walls is you are following the local government rules.
203_ItemDescription/404: This campfire is one of the basic tools of adventurers. It's recommended to cook meat over the fire since you will receive damage when you consume raw meat. You can ride the updraft arising from a campfire with a glider to fly efficiently.
203_ItemDescription/4101: A floor that is cool in summer but cold in winter. It's useful in hot climates but you may want to lay a carpet on top in colder climates.
203_ItemDescription/4102: A floor of a man working at his local radio station. This floor is located at a "harmless"planet, not found currently but found in the future. Lining up some fish would be nice. The dophins will surely appreciate it.
203_ItemDescription/4103: A single board cut out from Yggdrasil. Feared by the angels back when it was still a part of the Yggdrasil, it has let many kinds of heros step past it. Now that the manas are overflowing everywhere, it is used as a commodity.
203_ItemDescription/4104: A floor layed with lumbered wooden boards. The flat board can be used as a cutting board. Or maybe, it's made to be a cutting board? The word "cutting board" used here isn't a reference of somebody by the way.
203_ItemDescription/4105: The floor of the ruins of an ancient civilization. The world destruction program engraved on the surface can only be understood by electronic minds. As they are activated by the red button, agents named after fairies guard the button.
203_ItemDescription/4106: Floor made of sun-dried bricks. In arid regions, manure was used to reinforce their floors and were collected meticulously as they had various usage.
203_ItemDescription/4107: A floor that has been repaired numerous times. After repairing the hole in the floor everytime  the hole is spotted, it became a patchwork style. But the experience of reparing will guide you to a newer technology. The world needs bugs for innovation.
203_ItemDescription/4108: A light-weighted ceramic floor. A very excellent material, but when utilizing the topology optimization to the crystal structure on it, it causes a hole that will lead you to the science world. When you offer a cake to it, it returns as a lie.
203_ItemDescription/4117: This floor is planted with a large amount of grass. It's been said that "the more grass grows, the heavier it gets" since ancient times, and it seems the traditional phrase can be applied to this floor as well.
203_ItemDescription/4121: This floor is made of boiling lava pressed into a plate by an unknown force. Players will take damage in contact with this, but other mobs and materials will not be damaged due to the safety measures. What is safety?
203_ItemDescription/4122: You can color this floor by using the item "Spray Paint". This floor seems to be affected by a special skill, so you can apply color evenly without applying primer beforehand.
203_ItemDescription/416: This will allow you to age food materials and some items to mature. You can create some potions with this too. Contamination? I've never heard of it.
203_ItemDescription/4201: A tilted stone wall devised by castle lords. Tilted at an angle to prevent samurai from scaling it. It can even keep ninjas out!
203_ItemDescription/4202: The slanted wall of a wild man's house in a gown. If it starts to fall apart, take only a towel with you. If you know where your towel is, you don't really need anything else.
203_ItemDescription/4203: A single board cut out from Yggdrasil. In this mana-filled world, a legendary sword born from this tree is now mass producable. But please, don't thrust the sword to try to re-experience its legacy of the past.
203_ItemDescription/4204: A slope affixed with lumbered wooden boards. According to the research of a wild Architecture Department of Craftopia student, it is extremely difficult to connect the starting point to the end point using all of the slope series. If you can connect it perfectly without missing, you're on your way to get a Bachelor's Degree.
203_ItemDescription/4205: Walls that withstood years of wind and snow. In another universe, a competition where competitors had to cling on the slopes without falling became popular. Cheaters were not welcome.
203_ItemDescription/4206: Brick slope developed by a distinguished researcher through numerous experiments and calculation. Brick walls built diagonally should collapse, logically, but somehow stands as is exceeding the researcher's expectations.
203_ItemDescription/4207: A slanted wall coated with zinc steel. After the war that destroyed the influstructures, the humans, which lost its ways of creating new materials, restored it using only what they had in hand. Let's hope that someday, the memory core with all the information about technology will get discovered.
203_ItemDescription/4208: A light-weighted ceramic floor that's a bit worn out. This floor has been stepped by many famous spacemen in countless number of  world's timeline. James, Jean, Benjamin, Catherine, Johnathan, Michael... The super famous 117th John must have stepped on this floor too.
203_ItemDescription/4221: This slope is made of boiling lava pressed into a plate by an unknown force. Players will take damage in contact with this, but other mobs and materials will not be damaged due to the safety measures. What is safety?
203_ItemDescription/4222: You can color this slope by using the item "Spray Paint". This slope seems to be crafted with future technology that does not allow the painting to drip down even when the slope is slanted.
203_ItemDescription/428: You can refine your weapons with Refining Stones to increase their ATK. Thanks to the update, this can be automated too!
203_ItemDescription/429: You can refine your weapons with Refining Stones to increase their ATK. It can probably refine other items too, in the future.
203_ItemDescription/4301: One side of a gable wall for the roof. A gable wall is a wall which supports the roof. You will see this in East Asian hip-and-gable style roof. It has a very nice flow of air, works as a chimney that lets the smoke from the hearth out. But, the cold wind from the outside is a bit of a downside.
203_ItemDescription/4302: One side of a gable wall. A weak point against a strung gust. A gust strong enough can blow away the roof. If calculated right, you might be able to make a flying house.
203_ItemDescription/4303: A gable wall for the roof. The gaps arn't there for staring at strangers outside. The gaps arn't there for being stared at by a stranger outside also.
203_ItemDescription/4304: One side of a gable wall for the roof. Sorry for the wait. We may have made you wait for a bit too long in fact. Now this time, you will no longer get frusterated by the cold wind flowing into your room through the cracks.
203_ItemDescription/4305: One side of a gable wall. A gable wall is a wall which supports the roof.
203_ItemDescription/4306: A gable wall for the roof. Love filling up the gaps? Well, you will love it even more.-- oh, don't mention about the variations. It will eventually increase, you will stick around with us for a bit longer ... right?
203_ItemDescription/432: This will scrap weapons put into this and generate Refining Stones of the same rank as the weapon. Please be alert to your surroundings and don't get yourself into it.
203_ItemDescription/44: A one-handed sword made of stone. It's better than fighting with your bare hands, but you'll need a stronger weapon if you plan on going into a dungeon.
203_ItemDescription/4401: Windows are a framework which connect one universe with another. Based on a legend of a goddess slaying a devil through the window with her bow and arrows, the windows in this world are made in a certain size that allows you to snipe enemies through them.
203_ItemDescription/4422: You can color this window by using the item "Spray Paint". If the true Craftopian craftsman works on it, they can neatly paint the specified area without masking.
203_ItemDescription/45: A one-handed sword made of copper. Copper is quite weak, but it's easy to obtain and craft with it. It's actually rather precious.
203_ItemDescription/4501: Door frames made for you to attach a door to a wall. Made with easy setup in mind. Daijoubu, here we go!
203_ItemDescription/4509: Wooden arch. This is a wooden arch. This is no doubt a wooden arch. What? Did you just say it doesn't look like one? Citizen, that is considered treason. (ZAP!ZAP!) ......Maybe the next one to press the button will know better.
203_ItemDescription/4522: You can color this door frame by using the item "Spray Paint". The reason why this door frame doesn't have a door is that the door will get stuck and will not open if you color the door and the frame at the same time.
203_ItemDescription/46: A one-handed iron sword. Iron and steel are different so be careful.
203_ItemDescription/4601: A straw‐thatched Roof. To all piggies, do not take refuge in here. The wolves will blow it away. To all Wolves, do not blow the roof away. You will be stewed and eaten.
203_ItemDescription/4602: A roof made from scale-like tiles. A fairy-tale-like roof like this give off feelings as if fairies will come visit. A fun world like this, citing from the manual, should atleast have 15f.
203_ItemDescription/4609: A ceramic roof that's a bit warn out. Used as a material for the gigantic spaceship. A commander that sits cross-legged and loves to drink some brandy tea might have been here, since the roof's also used for the commander's office. A new page of an academic papers... being written...
203_ItemDescription/464: Autonomously cuts down trees with mysterious force. Made with strong focus on safety, so the blades are not dangerous. No reports of injury yet, at least.
203_ItemDescription/465: Thanks to the technological breakthroughs coming from the company's efforts, you can limit the area and select the target by using Virtual Walls. The rotating saws will stop for safety reasons when the owner approaches, so you can collect items from this machine without getting injured.
203_ItemDescription/47: A one-handed silver sword. Silver is said to fight off evil, and there are monsters that run away just at the sight of it.
203_ItemDescription/4701: A flat straw thatched roof. It is one of the most attention-gathering material in the Craftopia Plantation Subcommittee. In order to have enough supplies of straw, you will need a big supply source, but in this world, that's a little difficult.
203_ItemDescription/4702: A roof made of stacking scale-like fragments. According to the structural mechanics, this is pointless. For the researchers working with the unified field theory might find it interesting. Maybe... I don't even know.
203_ItemDescription/4705: An inorganic-ish roof. Imagine being enclosed into a room made out of the material used for this roof, now that's real scary stuff. There might be an exit. Might have a better luck if you know algebra. Same things can be said about life too.
203_ItemDescription/473: This reaping machine will reap the surrounding crops at regular intervals once installed. It seems to be a common thing in every age that the ancient reliable methods are more appreciated than the noble modern technologies of the future.
203_ItemDescription/476: Autonomously mines minerals with mysterious force. Only for bedrocks. Requires modules for complete automation.
203_ItemDescription/48: A one-handed gold sword. A sparkling sword for the wealthiest adventurers. It sparkles so much that it attracts those who are desperate for riches.
203_ItemDescription/480: If you put items into this machine, this will generate and produce recycled materials every time the total price of items reaches a certain amount. This machine is designed to reduce the waste of excess items produced by excessive automation.
203_ItemDescription/4801: A part useful for filling the little gaps between slopes. Perfect to fill that hole in your heart...
203_ItemDescription/49: A one-handed platinum sword. Why would you use such a precious material to make a sword?
203_ItemDescription/4901: One side of a corner of a roof. People laughing at the straws not knowing it's our resident and it supports the walls! It can float without them walls nor them pillars! How's that power of the straws, just look at em go!
203_ItemDescription/4902: One side of a corner of a roof. The pillars are no longer with us.. it is dead. But the rafters! The building! It's being supported by a magical power! Even if the surface is covered in molds, just change it up with them brand new straws! Champion of the World Heritage! How's that power of the straws, just look at em go!
203_ItemDescription/4903: A corner of a roof. Back when the Building Standards Act was still in effect, you would have had to sign paperworks, turn it in, get rejected, questioned, signed paperworks gets lost, gets found, discussed carefully at the public hearing, gets lost again.... in this world, no need for that.
203_ItemDescription/50: A one-handed sword made of adamantite. Rarity doesn't mean destructibility.
203_ItemDescription/500: You can use this facility to sell unwanted items on the market. Selling items will take a long time, so it is important to act early. Generally, higher quality items sell for more.
203_ItemDescription/5001: A table with a light color the lifts the spirits. Eating with company is very fun. If everybody could set aside their differences and sit at the same table and eat, world peace would seem easily achievable.
203_ItemDescription/5002: A table with a dark, calming color. Eating alone on a big table gives you a strong sense of independence, with no need to worry about others around you. If you feel lonely, your smartphone device is a good way to distract yourself. Watching a certain twintailed blonde girl struggle at a videogame is pretty great.
203_ItemDescription/5003: A large round table. Fathers in Japan have long expressed their fatherhood through flipping these tables vertically 540°. Over the years, the round tables have increased in size and weight, testing the fathers across the country. One could track down to this fact as a reason that the strongest being of the world emerged from this coutnry.
203_ItemDescription/5004: A round table. A round table was used to allow people to speak regardless of their status, but as time passed people started to assign order of class to the seats either way. The great king who devised this may be angry to find this out, but he should be more worried about his new form in a recent interpretation.
203_ItemDescription/501: You can use this facility to sell unwanted items on the market. You can sell more items at once than normal markets.
203_ItemDescription/5021: A wooden chair. As a result of questioning about why we become hungry, knowing that fighting, or being kind won't help, we discovered that sitting on a chair helps prevent hunger.
203_ItemDescription/5022: A chair that prevents you from getting hungry. Used for the Craftopia Academy Extreme Chairing Competition. Who will discover the weirdest spot you could sit on? The developers are trembling right now.
203_ItemDescription/5023: A simple furniture that seats one. A little too small to lounge and relax on, but could work in your favor by helping you focus. A nice decor as well. Sitting on a stool outside brings out my artistic self... I guess I can try painting again.
203_ItemDescription/5024: A simple furniture that seats one. A little too small to lounge and relax on, but could work in your favor by helping you focus. A nice decor as well. Sitting on a stool outside brings out my artistic self... I guess I can try painting again.
203_ItemDescription/5025: A simple furniture that seats one. Beware of kung fu fighters when they arm themselves with a chair. In the hands of a kung fu master, anything is a weapon, a shield, or a trap.
203_ItemDescription/5026: A simple furniture that seats one. A little rough on the edges. Seems it has been brought home by a Japanese middle schooler after making a chair in class.
203_ItemDescription/5027: A seat for those waiting for their turn. I may be sitting on the bench now, but you never know the next time. You could strategize all you want, but in the end, what makes the difference are the basics. So I do 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, and 10km running every single day.
203_ItemDescription/5028: A handmade bench which you could feel the warmth of the tree it was made from. Perfect for relaxing out in the sun. However, you could choose to float, sink, or fly using this bench. This is what true freedom is like.
203_ItemDescription/5029: A bench with a backrest. Even a common looking bench like this would look more impressive if you found Anubis sitting in it. What, no? Of course it would, he's a god.
203_ItemDescription/5030: A bench with a backrest. It is hoped to bring a new wind to the extreme chairing contest, but its solid four feet would definitely prove to be challenging.
203_ItemDescription/5031: This facility relieves your desperate need. The significance of owning this facility in place is undeniable both from a hygienic and cultural point of view. It is essential for the efficient recovery of special organic compounds; therefore, many of those who pushed that button have requested this facility.
203_ItemDescription/5032: This facility relieves your desperate need. When you travel long distances after eating and drinking a lot, the facility seen from a distance may be covered in divine lights.
203_ItemDescription/5041: A bookshelf with plenty of room. All the bookshelf space excites you with the image of all the books you would fill them with. The empty space of the bookshelf is just space waiting to be filled by new books. The remaining space may be short lived, but enjoy it while it lasts.
203_ItemDescription/5042: A bookshelf with plenty of room. The ability to store books both vertically and horizontally proves how roomy it is. With this amount of space, maybe I can buy that series with very large books. I can't wait to see them lined up.
203_ItemDescription/5043: Waist height drawers. Seeing various sizes of drawers make you feel like you could store anything.
203_ItemDescription/5044: Waist height drawers. If you don't need to close the drawers afterwards, the most efficient way to check the contents would be to open from the bottom. This is useful information only for burglars and heroes, however.
203_ItemDescription/5045: Tall shelves not only for storing but also for decorating. Decoration is often necessary for those that invite many to their homes. The first step to a luxurious lifestyle is decorating your home with tableware. The bright color accentuates dark colored plates.
203_ItemDescription/5046: Tall shelves not only for storing but also for decorating. The dark color compliments white plates very well. It is to gain historic presence as the years pass.
203_ItemDescription/5047: A common bar counter. With enough of these around, you could almost imagine a bard standing in the middle of the bar.
203_ItemDescription/5048: A counter you would see in the wild west. You see the bar master polishing his glasses, and a regular is smirking at the corner as he sees you. You could bravely order rum, order a thin beer, or perhaps ordering milk could be fun as well.
203_ItemDescription/5049: A common bar counter. With enough of these, you could form a stage for dancers. If you are lucky, you could come across a fortune teller taking care of her dancer sister after she's had one too many drinks.
203_ItemDescription/5050: A counter you would see in the wild west. On these corners you would often see a man of unknown nature drinking alone. He could be your rival, or an assassin watching you closely. You could ignore him, or talk to him pretending to pick up a coin you dropped.
203_ItemDescription/5051: A table you'd want to place next to your bed. This drawer has a curse preventing it to be opened. Suitable for storing a notebook you cannot afford anybody else seeing it. If somebody tries to forcibly open it, it will go up in flames, ensuring you peace of heart when leaving home.
203_ItemDescription/5052: A table you'd want to place next to your bed. This drawer cannot be opened even with a thief's key, a magic key, or even an ultimate key.
203_ItemDescription/5060: If you deploy this stepping stone, you can spawn on its position when you die or re-enter an island. However, the effect of bed takes effect before this item's one when you die. The effect cannot be triggered in a dungeon.
203_ItemDescription/5061: A base bed you can respawn from if you happen to die. Cannot be used in a dungeon. Wake up to the voice of the early bird and start your day full-throttle, scarfing down a nutritious salad. Grab some run-of-the-mill milk and maybe head to Animal Town today, or do you want to look for a wild alpaca you haven't seen yet? Getting a revenge on that guy who killed me isn't so bad too. Everything starts from this bed.
203_ItemDescription/5062: A base bed you can respawn from if you happen to die.Cannot be used in a dungeon. After being falsely accused and ducking through an unstable portal, a fierce dragon, raging sheep, and a giant encircling elephant. With a knife of determination in your hand, when you die in a full burst, you'll start again from this bed.
203_ItemDescription/5063: You can skip a night by sleeping. This doesn't set a respawn point.
203_ItemDescription/5081: A tent made with thick fabric and wood. Perfect for camping, but beware of wild animals. Especially bears, since they are known as very curious and stubborn animals; they will find their way into the tent and help themselves with whatever food they find. Not to mention you are no exception to the "food" they find.
203_ItemDescription/5087: This parasol is the best option to block the harsh sunlight in midsummer. You can have the vacation feeling whenever you place a beach chair along with this parasol. She's waiting for you on the beach.
203_ItemDescription/5088: This parasol is made for blocking sunlight, not for covering you from rain. Even though you are caught in a shower in this world, your precious times will not be taken away.
203_ItemDescription/51: A one-handed sword made of the legendary mineral mythril. It's not a legendary item, even though it's made of legendary materials.
203_ItemDescription/5101: A torch to light the dark. Also known as Master Torch. Practicing ancient martial art techniques had to be kept on the down low, so training was usually done late in the night. As the torches, lighting the darkness for the martial artists, were there to witness it all, they eventually earned the title "master". This does not mean you will get stronger trying to fight the torch.
203_ItemDescription/5102: Reinforced torches. Makes you think about the progress you've made remembering the times you were still using wooden torches.
203_ItemDescription/5103: Fancy lighting for your walls. The flame makes you think of campfires.
203_ItemDescription/5104: This lantern is decorated with auspicious characters known as inverted happiness and necessary decoration for the Lunar New Year. It plays a supporting role in both the mysterious room of a Taoist and the cyberpunk eaves of a street vendor. In rare cases, it works well with German tanks.
203_ItemDescription/5105: This long red lantern is decorated for good luck. It's better to cover the walls, floor, ceiling, and the whole area with these lanterns instead of hanging one or two of them. If you decorate the area splendidly, it may lure good luck and fortune to you.
203_ItemDescription/5121: A small bonfire that can be placed even on hills. In the dark night, together under this light, as long as we are bonded together with the power of friendship, we have nothing to fear. Your friend may somehow be on fire, burning down the wall there in the process, but it is all trivial.
203_ItemDescription/5122: A big bonfire that can be placed even on hills. "Light a torch and deliver this letter," a smart person like you should be capable of following this order without a problem. The only issue is that you were trying to teach a goblin to do it for you.
203_ItemDescription/5123: A lightsource that make the world so much brighter. It can tip over easily so think through where you place them. Prepare to have some gold for reparation if you burn down somebody's village. Beware of a hero with a feathered cap.
203_ItemDescription/5124: A lightsource that make the world so much brighter. It can tip over easily so think through where you place them. Eventually, somebody will knock over this torch. It's not going to be me, and it's not going to happen today. Safety inspection is complete, we may now proceed.
203_ItemDescription/5125: A portable lantern. It won't break even if you throw it, but since it is fueled with bioethanol, you won't be able to make the enemy slip and fall by dispersing it. The Game Master must be in relief on the other side of the screen.
203_ItemDescription/5126: A streetlight that slices through the darkness and enlightens our path. In the ancient imperial capital, young girls sing love when the lights go out. In the flower capital, young girls gather, humming a song, as the lights cease.
203_ItemDescription/5127: A streetlight that slices through the darkness and enlightens our path. When the light is lost in the city of liberty, the young girls will advance to the light, and when the light is lost in the new Imperial City, the new young girls will leap forward to rejoice in their dreams.
203_ItemDescription/5128: An exotic gas lamp. The white steam covering the streetlights faintly illuminate the night you smiled. No matter what kind of thief or monster appears, you will not give up.
203_ItemDescription/5129: A face made from a pumpkin. It looks kind of cute, but could be spooky if seen at night. You can eat it after you are done decorating. Suitable for seasonal decoration.
203_ItemDescription/5130: A decorated tree. At the end of the year, children celebrate by singing various songs, but the standard tunes are sung and modified at the same time, and local products are woven into the songs. Considering that events that used to be held during the cold season will someday include coconuts and kangaroos, songs that praise or curse Krael will surely be popular here.
203_ItemDescription/5131: A row of lanterns. The Lunar New Year used to be celebrated in Japan, but the Meiji Government suddenly changed the calendar and stopped celebrating it. It is said that samurai were surprised by this earth-shattering event as if the sky and the ground were turned upside down.
203_ItemDescription/5132: A row of lanterns. The flood of red color is suiting for the Lunar New Year, but use it wisely when you want to add a little accent. Where different cultures collide, many new things are born. These lanterns are one of them. The gorgeous Chinese lanterns and the calm Japanese lanterns blend together to create this exotic atmosphere.
203_ItemDescription/5133: This lantern is covered with paper. Its box-shaped frame is strong and durable enough so the lantern can be used for a long time. For this reason, they are often handed down from parent to child, and some families might have their own treasured lanterns.
203_ItemDescription/5134: This lantern is covered with paper. Particularly, a contrived lantern is called a running lantern, and the updraft of candles can spin the shadow puppets around. It used to be a festive decoration, but now it has become the symbol of a near-death experience and marked-for-death.
203_ItemDescription/5138: This set of artificial stone pillars seems to have a particular use... ("For advanced players," this item has a wider range than [ITEM:5139]. Covering the same chunk with [ITEM:5138] and [ITEM:5139] does nothing special.)
203_ItemDescription/5139: This artificial stone pillar seems to have a particular use... ("For advanced players" This placeable keeps physics alive in a distant place from players. FPS could be lower when many chunks are working. Placing multiple Monoliths in the same chunk does nothing special.)
203_ItemDescription/5140: This wall can be deployed to limit the area where some machines can move around. But any living thing can surpass it without getting interrupted.
203_ItemDescription/5141: A flag that prevents monsters from spawning nearby. The effective range can be seen on the minimap. It will not prevent enemies from entering the area from the outside. This magnificent flag's design was inspired by a replica of an homage of a certain guild's flag, which was known to reign ages ago. It actually has no resemblance to its original anymore.
203_ItemDescription/5143: This item may bring you despair. Even though this beautiful world is filled with all kinds of possibilities, buttered toast always lands buttered side down; it rains after you wash your car; the more you want, the less chance you acquire splendid loots from a loot box. Of course, you won't realize you have no paper left until it's too late.
203_ItemDescription/5144: This object is always available in the bathroom. You can wipe your hands with it, though it is better to use disposable ones if you want to maintain a hygienic environment.
203_ItemDescription/5145: A flag that prevents monsters from spawning nearby. The effective range can be seen on the minimap. It will not prevent enemies from entering the area from the outside.
203_ItemDescription/5161: A wooden box that can be filled with a variety of things inside. Don't be a thief! Breaking and taking from another person's wooden box is generally frowned upon. Frost mines are not welcome in these households.
203_ItemDescription/5171: Barrels that can be filled with all sorts of things inside. Probably better known as a gorilla's thrown weapon or a cannon. If you're an alchemist, you'll be extraordinarily particular about how to pronounce it. Ta-ru!
203_ItemDescription/5190: This is an elaborate plushie made by an enthusiastic fan of Mono. Fans have expressed their love in paintings, illustrations, and sculptures, and those works have been at the center of attention of button pushers. This plushie is one of those works and required King Mono Fluid to recreate its texture and characteristics.
203_ItemDescription/5191: The statue of Anubis, the servant of God. He is a man of absolute obedience to the God he serves, and the only response he is allowed is "Yes, Sir!" He has to pick up the phone with one call even if he's asleep; he always has to stand on the train to work. It's almost like a vacation when he is summoned to the overworld. He sometimes dances because it feels good to be on the ground.
203_ItemDescription/5192: The statue of Anubis, who was corrupted by overworking. His carefree life on the ground became more hell than hell because he has been working overtime. He read the memories of the destroyed planet from pieces of the memory, and he realized that he needs to take a break before he breaks himself. Therefore, he sometimes switches places with his moving statue.
203_ItemDescription/5200: This Mono seems to appear in Saturday Night Fever. It looks like a projection, though it is an afterimage with mass. The rumor says the items that disappear from the world of Craftopia are sent to another dimension by this Mono.
203_ItemDescription/5201: A door that can be opened. Or closed. Just enough to prevent animals from barging in to your campfires. This will surely please the animal rights activists.
203_ItemDescription/5222: You can color this cube by using the item "Spray Paint". Some crafters seem to be having a heated debate about which is better, the board or the box, forever into the future.
203_ItemDescription/5280: You can play a sound with it if you deploy it.
203_ItemDescription/5281: You can play a sound with it if you deploy it.
203_ItemDescription/5282: You can play a sound with it if you deploy it.
203_ItemDescription/5301: These square pillars can support a structure. It is tiring to fabricate them into squares, but convenient to put them together. A pillar under high compressive stress will buckle; however, it isn't easy to detect the signs in advance. Probably it's important not to put too much pressure on either the person or the pillar.
203_ItemDescription/5302: These round pillars can support a structure. Logs can be used as they are, but they need to be processed to put them together. Once you become a pillar, you're required to support everything from the school where you spend your youth to the organization of demon hunters. Overworking in this position is often concerned.
203_ItemDescription/536: Seems treasure boxes from other worlds look like this. You will receive various Gacha Capsules depending on the kind of Gacha Coin.
203_ItemDescription/537: Seems treasure boxes from other worlds look like this. Use [ITEM:2104] to receive a [ITEM:2126].
203_ItemDescription/538: Seems treasure boxes from other worlds look like this. Use [ITEM:2105] to receive a [ITEM:2126].
203_ItemDescription/5546: This potion grants you heat resistance for a while. The peppers will raise your blood pressure to the limit and energize you enough to achieve something. You'll be so energetic that you want to fire machine guns, but the effect of red herbs that protects your stomach will wear off after a while.
203_ItemDescription/5547: This potion grants you heat resistance and hellfire resistance for a while. The highest level of spiciness in hell will make you feel like you're on a hot streak. You'll feel so energetic that you're about to awaken as the bravest person in history, but the effect of red herbs that protects your stomach will wear off after a while.
203_ItemDescription/5548: This potion grants you cold resistance for while.
203_ItemDescription/5550: This potion grants you poison resistance for while.
203_ItemDescription/5565: A priest blesses this bottle of water. It can cure the bad status effect such as Hellfire and Evil Spirit. Holy Water is small and light but expensive, so it is transported by airplane or highway. Examiners need to be under the effect of Hellfire to distinguish it from water in a timely manner, so prayer factories are often built in the inland area of hell.
203_ItemDescription/5566: This mystic water can be used to remove bad status effects such as slow movement speed, slow attack speed, higher stamina consumption.
203_ItemDescription/5567: This mystic water can be used to remove bad status effects such as low defense and low magic resistance.
203_ItemDescription/5573: Item drop rate and enchantment rate will be increased by 1.3 times when defeating enemies. The highest effect of the same effects only apply. This potion has the taste of sin. You'll be feeling sorry.
203_ItemDescription/5574: Item drop rate and enchantment rate will be increased by 2 times when defeating enemies. The highest effect of the same effects only apply. This potion has the taste of sin. You'll be feeling a little bit guilty.
203_ItemDescription/5575: Item drop rate and enchantment rate will be increased by 5 times when defeating enemies. The highest effect of the same effects only apply. This potion has the taste of sin. You'll be feeling anything special.
203_ItemDescription/5576: Item drop rate and enchantment rate will be increased by 10 times when defeating enemies. The highest effect of the same effects only apply. This potion has the taste of sin. You'll be feeling ridiculously happy.
203_ItemDescription/5579: Calls the dead spirit back to this world by forgiving their sins. When you use it, it reduces the nearest boss enemy's respawning time to 0 seconds. If you use it while the target is alive, they will be immediately recalled after their death. Note that there is no duplicate effect.
203_ItemDescription/5582: You can instantly teleport to the bed when you use this.
203_ItemDescription/5583: It seems to have the effect of resurrecting all dead players in a small area around you when you use it. Many players can't use it before they die because it is valuable and precious.
203_ItemDescription/5590: Refining Stone required for Weapon Refining. You can use this to strengthen weapons of 9 stars or lower up to Refining Level 20.
203_ItemDescription/5591: Refining Stone required for Weapon Refining. You can use this to strengthen weapons of 9 stars or lower up to Refining Level 40.
203_ItemDescription/5592: Refining Stone required for Weapon Refining. You can use this to strengthen weapons of 9 stars or lower up to Refining Level 70. It's too pure to use at a primary Refinery.
203_ItemDescription/5593: Refining Stone required for Weapon Refining. You can use this to strengthen weapons of 9 stars or lower up to Refining Level 99, weapons of 10 stars or higher up to Refining Level 70. It's too pure to use at a primary Refinery.
203_ItemDescription/5594: Refining Stone required for Weapon Refining. You can use this to strengthen weapons of high Refining Level. It's too pure to use at a primary Refinery.
203_ItemDescription/5595: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, stones will be available to mine again. The rumor has it that this system has been behind the civilizations of giant rocks around the world because there is no need to worry about stones as long as this item exists.
203_ItemDescription/5596: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, sands will be available to mine again.

203_ItemDescription/5599: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, silvers will be available to mine again.

203_ItemDescription/5602: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, adamantiums will be available to mine again.

203_ItemDescription/5615: This supplement dramatically stimulates growth when poured onto Tree Seedling. It doesn't seem to have any effect on crops other than Tree Seedling so far. The combination of tree seedlings and nutrition supplements made it possible for us to plant trees anywhere. Of course, there has not been a single problem reported since the environmental assessment is perfect.
203_ItemDescription/5616: This supplement uplifts underground bedrocks to enable them to be mined when poured onto exhausted bedrocks. The magnificent uplift may intimidate others and attract devils.

203_ItemDescription/5622: If you plant it, it will grow into a tree from which you can harvest Logs and Straws. It requires Nutrition Supplement to grow.
203_ItemDescription/5623: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, sulfurs will be available to mine. Some of the materials inside of the bedrock have suddenly mutated due to the component of a meteorite and resulted in this miracle.
203_ItemDescription/5624: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, bauxites will be available to mine. Some of the materials inside of the bedrock have suddenly mutated due to the component of a meteorite and resulted in this miracle.
203_ItemDescription/5625: If you place it onto an exhausted bedrock and pour an Uplifting Supplement, rare metals will be available to mine. Some of the materials inside of the bedrock have suddenly mutated due to the component of a meteorite and resulted in this miracle.

203_ItemDescription/57: A pickaxe made of malleable metal. It can bend if it hits a rock so you have to handle it carefully.
203_ItemDescription/5701: This gunpowder was designed for firearms and developed to improve productivity and reduce smoke emissions. Thanks to this, we won't have to worry about black gunpowder anymore... will we?
203_ItemDescription/5706: This material can be used to craft ammunition for various guns.
203_ItemDescription/572: A billboard that you can write anything you want. But don't write insults targeted to anyone.
203_ItemDescription/5750: This wood is naturally very hard. Because of its high density, it is heavy and sinks in water. Its high strength and weather resistance make it valuable as a building material. It is also known as Tetsunoki and is a material that will be needed by Ohisama when she gets used to growing rice.
203_ItemDescription/5752: In ancient times, the loots from ferocious beasts like this sharp hard talon were sometimes treated like currency. If your friend beast gave you a gift, you should keep it in your bag,
203_ItemDescription/5753: An artisan molded and hardened this leather. It is soft and flexible when molded, and its hardness and strength are useful for making tools. And considering that it can be the last food left in the snow, it may be more valuable than plastic.
203_ItemDescription/576: If you deploy this frame onto a chest and put the item that you want to show, this will display the item. You can utilize this to be good at managing storage. You could spark joy.
203_ItemDescription/5780: You can use an Enchanting Table to apply the enchantments of this scroll to an item of your choice. This technology is still under research, and more features may be implemented in the future.
203_ItemDescription/5785: This palm-size jar full of mysterious medicine will grant you a bit of EXP if you drink it. No one knows what kind of experience you'll experience, though.
203_ItemDescription/5786: This handful-size jar full of mysterious medicine will grant you a small amount of EXP if you drink it. No one knows what kind of experience you'll experience, though.
203_ItemDescription/5787: This medium-size jar full of mysterious medicine will grant you EXP if you drink it. No one knows what kind of experience you'll experience, though.
203_ItemDescription/5788: This large-size jar full of mysterious medicine will grant you lots of EXP if you drink it. No one knows what kind of experience you'll experience, though.
203_ItemDescription/5789: This giant-size jar full of mysterious medicine will grant you a tremendous amount of EXP if you drink it. No one knows what kind of experience you'll experience, though.
203_ItemDescription/58: Iron pickaxe. Iron and steel are different so be careful.
203_ItemDescription/5801: A document of something from ancient ages, in poor condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5802: A sample of something from ancient ages, in poor condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5803: A fossil of something from ancient ages, in poor condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5804: A document of something from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5805: A sample of something from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5806: A fossil of something from ancient ages. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5807: A document of something from ancient ages, in good condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5808: A sample of something from ancient ages, in good condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5809: A fossil of something from ancient ages, in good condition. There seem no other ways to use it except for delivering it...
203_ItemDescription/5830: This explosive is throwable. It's one of the basic equipment for infantry. Sometimes a drill sergeant throws at newbies in training to test their courage.
203_ItemDescription/5831: This explosive is throwable. It leaves fire around the point of explosion and deals burning damage over time. Even though you defeat enemies with burning damage, you will not be able to obtain Fried Animal Flesh...
203_ItemDescription/5832: This explosive is throwable. It paralyzes the things around the point of explosion. It can also make flying enemies fall down. This grenade is usually called flashbang, which is often used by special forces when they need to forcibly enter somewhere.
203_ItemDescription/5833: This explosive is throwable. It lays a smokescreen to block the sight to help you hide from enemies. The amount of smoke is usually more than you expect. You might miss enemies when you overuse them.
203_ItemDescription/5848: This ancient traditional trap can make enemies and vehicles slip but doesn't protect you from the turtle shells thrown by enemies. You better be very careful not to step on it, especially on the one you set, by mistake.
203_ItemDescription/5849: If you throw it at an enemy, it may make them fall.
203_ItemDescription/5850: This leaf is essential to human culture. It can be steamed, ground, fermented, and processed in various ways to make a beverage. Whether it's after running a generator, slaying a dragon, or meteorite falling down to your base, a cup of tea will make all the difference in the world.
203_ItemDescription/5851: This nectar collected by bees is beloved by bears. Monkeys don't seem to have an interest in it, and they tend to think it's just glue that sticks to the wall. Fortunately, this nectar is not collected by flies; that's why I can recommend it to everyone,
203_ItemDescription/5852: This rare ingredient can be harvested from a beehive. If you continue to eat this delicious jelly, you may end up being a queen bee. If you don't want to deal with the gorilla holding a barrel or the parrot spitting walnuts, you should taste this in a moderate manner.
203_ItemDescription/5853: This assortment of various spices for special dishes seems too spicy to cook normal dishes.
203_ItemDescription/5860: This fruit caused a bloody war between gorillas and crocodiles. The gorillas that hang out on the side of the road usually absorb its white contents through their mouths, and its skins are used to make traps for dirty play in kart racing. However, there seems to be no plan for global regulation of its use.
203_ItemDescription/5861: Horses love this carrot. Eating a lot of carrots doesn't make you more powerful, but it makes you fatter. Raw carrots are delicious. The special dishes cooked with carrots are even more delicious and the dream of all horses.
203_ItemDescription/5890: An ancient creature, carrying a shell that is delicious when boiled or grilled. Normally docile, but when provoked can shoot great lasers from its eyes, destroying friend and foe alike. It is said to be good friends with the Japanese Pepper Fish.
203_ItemDescription/5891: This creature protects its delicate content with thorns that hurt everyone who touches it. They can live for a hundred years if there are no external enemies, but it rarely lives that long due to their delicious contents. Some theories say that they can be summoned by pouring soy sauce over sweet puddings.
203_ItemDescription/5892: This creature has a geometric form and wavy tentacles. They are highly intelligent, and they fight for their territory by the colors they paint and communicate by waving their shiny tentacles. Their songs will make you feel heaven when you listen, make you feel paradise when you sing.
203_ItemDescription/59: Silver pickaxe. Silver is said to fight off evil, so many monsters dislike it. If made into an alloy, it can become quite sturdy.
203_ItemDescription/5927: This dish can be cooked by stuffing a hamburg steak with the carrots that horses love. Its sauce might be left around your mouth when you eat a huge chunk of it, but it is that good.
203_ItemDescription/5928: Jack 'O Lantern gave you this basket of sweets as a gift. You'll be blessed or fooled when you eat these sweets.
203_ItemDescription/596: A barrel that explodes on impact. Not quite something that you would want to leave around people or buildings.
203_ItemDescription/5960: This stew is cooked with lots of Mono broth. It's believed that it takes ten years of training before you can successfully extract broth from Mono, which spawn a new individual Mono on contact with water.
203_ItemDescription/5961: This pudding is cooked with the elegant essence of Prince Mono. Most of them have used to have a hard texture, but some have become softer due to the recent trend of the market.
203_ItemDescription/5962: This noodle dish is cooked with broth from the pelvis of a skeleton. The broth is extracted very slowly by boiling at a low temperature, and the foam is removed carefully.
203_ItemDescription/5963: This fried food can be cooked with the wings of a phoenix with high-temperature oil. It has a very crispy texture, and the method of serving it is secret and protected.
203_ItemDescription/5964: This fried food is cooked simply only with Peko and potatoes. This dish can tell the tradition related to croquettes that everybody buys them when a typhoon comes.
203_ItemDescription/599: A punching bag made for practicing combat. Created by a Mono fanatic, so it looks like a Mono. Made to fly fast and far, just like a Mono. "How do you feel when your passionate work is struck so hard amongst players?" "Thank you for your attention."
203_ItemDescription/60: Gold pickaxe. To use such an expensive material to dig into the ground is a rather nouveau riche behavior.
203_ItemDescription/6000: This sword appears in stories of heroes who handle swords with artistry. Its blue handle is a bit cold when you touch it. When equipped, it allows you to use the skill Frost Mine. The 1st embodied secret of the other world is inscribed within this sword.
203_ItemDescription/602: This scarecrow is placed on the ground. He never surrenders, forfeits, nor regrets! He is outstanding in the field of being attacked. Rumor has it that he is considering that he'll appear from the ground when he hears the fantastic sounds of an ocarina.
203_ItemDescription/603: This firecracker stands out with its intense sound and light. Air pollution and noise have nothing to do with you, the first human being. Let's make a loud noise and get rid of the beast of the year. You might set your base on fire, but the beasts will avoid you when they see you blow up your assets.
203_ItemDescription/61: Platinum pickaxe. It's such a waste to smash an expensive material like this.
203_ItemDescription/62: A pickaxe made of adamantite. Rarity doesn't mean destructibility.
203_ItemDescription/6246: This poisonous spear deals poisonous damage to the enemies it slices through. Its users always hear a woman's laughter inside of their head, and they will gradually start doing anything to achieve their goals.
203_ItemDescription/6247: This poisonous spear deals poisonous damage to the enemies it slices through. Its users always hear a woman's laughter inside of their head, and they will gradually start doing anything to achieve their goals.
203_ItemDescription/6248: This poisonous spear deals poisonous damage to the enemies it slices through. Its users always hear a woman's laughter inside of their head, and they will gradually start doing anything to achieve their goals.
203_ItemDescription/6249: This poisonous spear deals poisonous damage to the enemies it slices through. Its users always hear a woman's laughter inside of their head, and they will gradually start doing anything to achieve their goals.
203_ItemDescription/6250: This poisonous spear cuts through flesh and stains it with poison. The wickedly twisted blade resembles a snake, and it widens the wound to inject the poison into the body. Rumor has it that some are willing to throw themselves under its blade because the person affected by its poison could feel the supreme pleasure.
203_ItemDescription/63: A pickaxe made of the legendary mineral mythril. It's not a legendary item, even though it's made of legendary materials.
203_ItemDescription/632: This cannon can shoot anything into the air. You might be surprised what it can shoot. Putting animals in it would be ill-advised.
203_ItemDescription/644: This conveyor belt can automatically transfer an object that you place on top of it. It's useful when you're trying to automate a distribution network.
203_ItemDescription/645: This red conveyor belt works 3 times efficiently. Its working speed is really 3 times faster than standard conveyor belts, not 1.3 times. However, the rumor has it that those button pushers have already invented even faster conveyor belts. We've always been astounded by how amazing the mechanism of Craftopian.
203_ItemDescription/647: You can't help but shout "woo hoo!" when you step on this board. The safety standard is regularized by the Horizontal Movement Committee in the Physical Calculation Department of Craftopia Association. But the illegally customized ones are more popular in the market.
203_ItemDescription/650: If you deploy this to assemble it into the line of conveyor belts, you can filter the items on the belts by choosing a condition.
203_ItemDescription/6500: This single-shot gun is the most effective at medium to long range. Requires [ITEM:190] to shoot. Since it is recreated based on lost information from a long time ago, the internal structure seems to be different from the original one...
203_ItemDescription/6501: This gun can shoot continuously and is the most effective at medium range. Requires [ITEM:191] to shoot. Since it is recreated based on lost information from a long time ago, the internal structure seems to be different from the original one...

Since it is recreated based on lost information from a long time ago, the internal structure seems to be different from the original one...

Since it is recreated based on lost information from a long time ago, the internal structure seems to be different from the original one...
203_ItemDescription/656: This prototype rocket is designed and developed to conduct the technology verification. It's not even close to reaching space, but launching this rocket may give you the afterglow.
203_ItemDescription/6580: This plant reproduces themselves only in hill area.
203_ItemDescription/6581: This mineral has crystalized only in hill area.
203_ItemDescription/6582: This tree reproduces themselves only in hill area.
203_ItemDescription/6583: This is a remnant of ancient civilizations in hill area.
203_ItemDescription/6585: This plant reproduces themselves only in meadow area.
203_ItemDescription/6586: This mineral has crystalized only in meadow area.
203_ItemDescription/6587: This tree reproduces themselves only in meadow area.
203_ItemDescription/6588: This is a remnant of ancient civilizations in meadow area.
203_ItemDescription/6590: This plant reproduces themselves only in archipelago area.
203_ItemDescription/6591: This mineral has crystalized only in archipelago area.
203_ItemDescription/6592: This tree reproduces themselves only in archipelago area.
203_ItemDescription/6593: This is a remnant of ancient civilizations in archipelago area.
203_ItemDescription/6595: This plant reproduces themselves only in valley area.
203_ItemDescription/6596: This mineral has crystalized only in valley area.
203_ItemDescription/6597: This tree reproduces themselves only in valley area.
203_ItemDescription/6598: This is a remnant of ancient civilizations in valley area.
203_ItemDescription/6600: This plant reproduces themselves only in iceberg area.
203_ItemDescription/6601: This mineral has crystalized only in iceberg area.
203_ItemDescription/6602: This tree reproduces themselves only in iceberg area.
203_ItemDescription/6603: This is a remnant of ancient civilizations in iceberg area.
203_ItemDescription/6653: Junk collected by goblins in the village. A junk can be an irreplaceable treasure to someone, and vice versa.
203_ItemDescription/6654: This is a token given as proof that they hunt a big game alone and become a full-fledged member of the tribe. It's a custom based on an ancient belief and an important rule that supports the tribe under harsh environments.
203_ItemDescription/6655: It's believed that several gods gathered to craft this mirror. But it's too old to be used as a mirror anymore.
203_ItemDescription/6656: This sword emerged from the body of the demon with eight heads when it was vanquished. It's too decayed to see the original form of the sword.
203_ItemDescription/6657: This gemstone was worshipped in ancient times. It's been passed down to the present age through war times, changing its owners from time to time.
203_ItemDescription/6658: An instant potion that restores a small amount of Life. You can craft this even without a workbench.
203_ItemDescription/6659: The treasure hidden in the ruin of Yarden Meadow. It seems to be older than the civilization that once thrived on this land.
203_ItemDescription/6660: This feed is needed to operate a livestock farm. It's highly nutritious enough to sustain the lives of anything from cows, Monos, to human beings.
203_ItemDescription/6689: This key can be inserted into a terminal of the tower.
203_ItemDescription/6690: This key was protected by "Satyr" in Geezah Plateau. You can use it on the terminal of the tower to see the technologies of lost civilizations.
203_ItemDescription/6691: This key was protected by "Messenger of the Underworld" in Millewind Hill. Civilizations of old times might create a backup of information on their technologies to prepare for the worst case.
203_ItemDescription/6692: This key was protected by "Lizard Gunner" in Yarden Meadow. It's understandable to create a backup for the worst-case scenarios, but it's indeed too much.
203_ItemDescription/6693: This key was protected by "Griffin" in Yarden Meadow. Civilizations will be founded when the technologies are found. Does that mean if you don't find technologies, civilization won't be founded?
203_ItemDescription/6694: This key was protected by "Noble Frog" in Owatatsu Archipelago. The security of this is way too much for human work. Did human beings really seal it?
203_ItemDescription/6695: This key was protected by "Lizard Executioner" in Brigandine Valley. Are the keys really stolen by monsters? If it's true, why do only strong monsters have the keys?
203_ItemDescription/6696: This key was protected by "Fenrir" in Sherbert Iceberg. What if the keys weren't stolen and strong monsters were given birth to protect the keys...? Nah, it's just hypothetical.
203_ItemDescription/6700: Wild strawberries widely bred in the land of Craftopia. If you break its tree, you'll never get a chance to harvest them again. This will teach you the spirit of not killing and not keeping them alive.
203_ItemDescription/6797: Everything about this material is unknown. Where this can be obtained, what this can be used for, everything is shrouded in mystery.
203_ItemDescription/6798: This is one of the relics left behind by civilizations of old times. You can lift items with this, but I don't think it has enough durability left in it to be brought outside and used.
203_ItemDescription/68: Wooden axe. Once you use it to cut down a tree, it will be destroyed. You will need another axe immediately.
203_ItemDescription/680: An animal fang that's useful for creating weapons. It's easy to process but hard to break.
203_ItemDescription/6800: You can note the recipe of "Fishing Boat" by using this item. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...
203_ItemDescription/6801: You can note the recipe of "Extension Magazine II" by using it. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...

203_ItemDescription/6829: You can note the recipe of "Shotgun II" by using this item. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...
203_ItemDescription/683: An animal leather that's useful for creating protective gears. If you're able to process it well, it won't decay easily and can be used for an extended period of time.
203_ItemDescription/6830: You can note the recipe of "Assault Rifle III" by using this item. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...
