203_ItemDescription/6854: You can note the recipe of "Extensive Sprinkler" by using this item. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...
203_ItemDescription/6855: You can note the recipe of "Super Extensive Sprinkler" by using this item. If you've already noted the recipe, there seems to be no way to use this item...
203_ItemDescription/686: An animal talon that's useful for creating weapons. It's a comparatively strong organic material that's easy to process.
203_ItemDescription/689: Elephant tusks. Elephants are listed as an endangered species, so overhunting is prohibited. Highly advanced technology is required to synthesize this material.
203_ItemDescription/69: Soft copper axe. It's more solid than the wooden axe but it's still malleable. Try not to swing it too hard and bend it.
203_ItemDescription/692: Bird feather is useful for creating protective gears or accessories. You can use it as an ornament.
203_ItemDescription/695: Animal bones. Suitable for weapon production. The strength of the bone would depend on the lifestyle of the animal, so it would be nice to obtain the bones of a healthy animal.
203_ItemDescription/698: The most basic material for crafting. First, let's make a pickaxe and a workbench.
203_ItemDescription/699: Ore containing a large amount of Cu. Copper is the weakest metal in this world. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:711][//copper ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/70: Iron axe. Iron and steel are different so be careful.
203_ItemDescription/700: Ore containing a large amount of Fe. Iron, stronger than copper, weaker than silver. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:712][//iron ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/701: Ore containing a large amount of Ag. Silver is stronger than iron, weaker than Gold. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:713][//silver ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/702: Ore containing a large amount of Au. Gold, stronger than Silver, weaker than platinum. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:716][//gold ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/703: Ore containing a large amount of Pt. Platinum is stronger than gold, weaker than Adamantite. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:717][//platinum ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/704: Legendary ore. Adamantite is said to be the strongest metal in the world... for now. Can be smelted into a [ITEM:721][//adamantite ingot] with a [ITEM:356][//furnace] by removing various impurities.
203_ItemDescription/71: Silver axe. Silver is said to fight off evil, so many monsters dislike it. If made into an alloy, it can become quite sturdy.
203_ItemDescription/711: Copper ingot is the weakest ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/712: Iron ingot is stronger that copper ingot but weaker than silver ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/713: Silver ingot is stronger than iron ingot but weaker than Gold ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/714: Gold ingot is stronger than Silver ingot but weaker than platinum ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/715: Platinum ingot is stronger than gold ingot but weaker than Adamantite ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/716: Adamantite ingot is said to be the strongest ingot in the whole world. For now.
203_ItemDescription/718: Diamond Ingot is stronger than Platinum Ingot but weaker than Obsidian Ingot. Diamond Ingot has been successfully made with unexceptionally high heat power, which is the thing the human beings in the past couldn't achieve.
203_ItemDescription/719: Obsidian Ingot is stronger than Diamond Ingot but weaker than Palladium Ingot. Obsidian Ingot has been successfully made with unexceptionally high heat power, which is the thing the human beings in the past couldn't achieve.
203_ItemDescription/72: Golden axe. It is famous for being the weapon granted by the lake goddess, and it's wasteful to use it for every-day actions.
203_ItemDescription/720: Palladium ingot is stronger than obsidian ingot but weaker than adamantite ingot. An ingot is a block of highly concentrated metal that's been made by refining raw material and casting it into a mold.
203_ItemDescription/722: Red herb is a material used for life potion. You can create potions at a potion mixing facility.
203_ItemDescription/723: Out of all the red herbs, the ones that have been proven to have great effectiveness are called vermillion herbs.
203_ItemDescription/725: A standard life potion. It's been proven to be safe enough but there are side effects to any medicine.
203_ItemDescription/726: Life potion with double the standard amount. It's been proven to be safe enough but there are side effects to any medicine.
203_ItemDescription/728: A blood from some kind of animal. It has a bright red color and can restore your life points.
203_ItemDescription/73: Platinum axe. It's such a waste to smash an expensive material like this.
203_ItemDescription/7305: You can't go to the beach without this folding beach chair in midsummer. You can have the vacation feeling whenever you place a parasol along with this beach chair. She's waiting for you on the beach.
203_ItemDescription/7306: This beach chair is made for you to take a rest on the beach. Not only you but also your soul can feel relaxed under the harsh heat haze.
203_ItemDescription/731: A blood from some kind of rare animal. Because it contains elements that is not found within a human body, even a drop of it is precious.
203_ItemDescription/734: Blue herb is a material used for MP potion. You can create potions at a potion mixing facility.
203_ItemDescription/737: A standard mana potion. It's been proven to be safe enough but there are side effects to any medicine.
203_ItemDescription/738: This mana potion is prescribed as a double dose. It's been proven to be safe enough but there are side effects to any medicine.
203_ItemDescription/74: An axe made of adamantite. Rarity doesn't mean destructibility.
203_ItemDescription/740: Yellow herb is a material used to enhance potions. You can create potions at a potion mixing facility.
203_ItemDescription/743: A standard stamina potion. It's been proven to be safe enough but there are side effects to any medicine.
203_ItemDescription/746: Wooden material from a cut down tree. It can be used for various crafting. If you burn it you can create charcoal.
203_ItemDescription/749: You can create this by burning wood. You can also obtain it from putting wood in a campfire.
203_ItemDescription/75: An axe made of the legendary mineral mythril. It's not a legendary item, even though it's made of legendary materials.
203_ItemDescription/752: Just regular sand. Can be used to create glass.
203_ItemDescription/758: A sheep wool. It's a ball of fluff. It feels nice when you touch it. You can use it to create clothes.
203_ItemDescription/763: A basic material for gunpowder. The symbol for the element is S. It's an element that is both chemically and biologically important.
203_ItemDescription/764: Material used to make explosives. An essential matter for the modern civilization.
203_ItemDescription/769: A soda glass with lots of impurities. The color change depending on the elements and types of ions it's created from.
203_ItemDescription/772: A wall that you can place anywhere you like. Buildings can be rotated and put in place by [KEYMAP:RELOAD]. Beware that wooden buildings will be on fire when they are too close to the fire.
203_ItemDescription/773: A wall that you can place anywhere you like. Buildings can be rotated and put in place by [KEYMAP:RELOAD]. Beware that wooden buildings will be on fire when they are too close to the fire.
203_ItemDescription/774: A wall that you can place anywhere you like. Convenient for climbing up. Buildings can be rotated and put in place by [KEYMAP:RELOAD]. Beware that wooden buildings will be on fire when they are too close to the fire.
203_ItemDescription/775: Used to store items. Beware of fire as setting it on fire will result in losing the items inside. A steel chest would be safer.
203_ItemDescription/776: Used to store items. Non-flammable but vulnerable to explosions and impact. Not as safe as an adamantite chest.
203_ItemDescription/777: This chest can contain a large number of items. Cemented carbide is tungsten carbide sintered with cobalt and is used for cutting tools because of its wear resistance. As a result of considering various additive elements, both tungsten and cobalt were forgotten to include. This is a common occurrence in the field of research and development.
203_ItemDescription/778: This chest has a super large size capacity.
203_ItemDescription/781: You can access the same content from anywhere via this personal chest. But you're not allowed to access the contents of others. The term of use emphasizes that the user of this chest is responsible for retaining the contents of the chest and for any information leakage. It also states that this is acknowledged by opening the chest.
203_ItemDescription/787: A big flaming torch. Both of your hands will be occupied but it will be quite bright around you.
203_ItemDescription/788: A small flaming torch. You can hold it in one hand and it makes things a bit brighter around you.
203_ItemDescription/799: This flight unit came alive by the power of science. Although it consumes jet fuel to gain thrust, it has an excellent upward acceleration force. Even though you boost beyond its limit, it doesn't break itself in midair.
203_ItemDescription/80: A two-handed sword made of stone. You might want a stronger weapon when you go to a dungeon.
203_ItemDescription/81: A two-handed sword made of copper. It's soft but easily obtainable and not difficult to process. You might need more of them than you expect.
203_ItemDescription/810: This special fuel is often used to gain thrust for a jetpack.
203_ItemDescription/811: Can be obtained from [ITEM:839][//bucket (water)] or magic. Water obtained from a [ITEM:332][//well] would be [ITEM:839][//bucket (water)], which would need to be processed.
203_ItemDescription/814: High-calorie grains. Does not spoil easily unless made into poweder, and many recipes are readily available all over the world.
203_ItemDescription/817: You can capture monsters by hitting them with this item. Weakened monsters are more likely to be captured. Monsters are stored in a multi-dimensional structure.
203_ItemDescription/82: A two-handed sword made of iron. Remember that iron and copper are different.
203_ItemDescription/83: A two-handed sword made of silver. It's believed that silver can keep the evil away. Some monsters might escape when they see silvers.
203_ItemDescription/835: An animal horn. Seems like it can be used to make both weapon and defense gear.
203_ItemDescription/838: By using this, you can make a captured enemy warm up to you. It's an important item if you want to become a tamer.
203_ItemDescription/839: A bucket with water inside. You can spread the water around you by using this item.
203_ItemDescription/84: A shining two-handed sword for nouveau riche. Its hideous brightness can lure money grabbers.
203_ItemDescription/840: This move gives damage to the enemy via repeated strikes.
203_ItemDescription/841: This move gives damage to the enemy by dropping a lightning bolt in an area you specify.
203_ItemDescription/842: This command makes pets and charmed mobs around you to do a jumping attack on the enemy.
203_ItemDescription/843: Taunt enemies to gain attention. Increased your [STATS:DEF] and your shield's [STATS:ATK] for a short period of time. Bonus [STATS:DEF] while guarding.
203_ItemDescription/844: Temporarily enter a berserk state to gain [STATS:ATK] and Attack Speed, but your [STATS:DEF] will decrease.
203_ItemDescription/845: Banish the evil air around you and remove the latest debuff you received.
203_ItemDescription/846: [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_PHYSICAL] will increase for a short period of time. When you kill an enemy, effect duration will refresh and [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_PHYSICAL] will further increase.
203_ItemDescription/847: A shield bash while charging. Increases the shield's [STATS:DEF].
203_ItemDescription/848: Leap above and fall into the enemy to strike from the sky. When you successfully hit an enemy, you will jump again.
203_ItemDescription/849: Fire arrows or shots that deal devastating damage.
203_ItemDescription/85: A two-handed sword made of platinum. Why would you use such a precious material to make a sword?
203_ItemDescription/850: Fire multiple arrows to a fan shape to deal damage.
203_ItemDescription/851: Consecutively fires arrows to a fan shape for three times. Apply slow effect to enemies on impact.
203_ItemDescription/852: Rapidly fire three arrows in a row to deal damage.
203_ItemDescription/853: A powerful attack that can kill an enemy with low [STATS:HP] with one blow. Less effective against boss enemies.
203_ItemDescription/854: Increases your [STATS:MOVEMENT_SPEED] for a certain period of time.
203_ItemDescription/855: Become invisible to everyone for a certain period of time.
203_ItemDescription/856: Resurrects all dead party members and heal the living party members within a certain area.
203_ItemDescription/857: You will not be able to move for a certain period of time, but you won't be attacked by enemies and your [STATS:HP] and [STATS:MP] will gradually heal.
203_ItemDescription/858: For a certain period of time your [STATS:MP_CONSUME_RATE] when using a skill will increase but your skill damage will greatly rise as well.
203_ItemDescription/859: You become invulnerable while casting and the skill heals [STATS:HP].
203_ItemDescription/86: A two-handed sword made of adamantite. Rarity doesn't mean destructibility.
203_ItemDescription/860: A magic that summons flames that burns away the enemy. Prolonged exposure to these flames apply the Hellfire debuff. Hellfire burn the essence of your life as fuel, unable to be doused by water as it is not physically burning. Multiple [ITEM:404] are required as catalysts.
203_ItemDescription/861: Gain money every time you attack enemies or objects.
203_ItemDescription/862: Detonates your pets and charmed mobs to deal damage to your surroundings.
203_ItemDescription/863: Shoot an ice cold laser that gradually applies Chill and Frost effects to the enemies. Multiple [ITEM:839] are required as catalysts.
203_ItemDescription/864: Deal damage to the first enemy hit with slashes faster than the eye can see.
203_ItemDescription/865: Deal damage within a certain area with an incredibly powerful slash that can cut through anything.
203_ItemDescription/866: Deal damage within a certain area by summoning a meteor shower. However, it can't be used in dungeons.
203_ItemDescription/867: A magic that releases blades of wind.
203_ItemDescription/868: Continuous strike on a fixed point. Can deflect a regular attack of an enemy.
203_ItemDescription/869: Strike a mighty blow to increase the power of throwing spear.
203_ItemDescription/87: A two-handed sword made of the legendary mineral mythril. It's not a legendary item, even though it's made of legendary materials.
203_ItemDescription/870: Move to the front of an enemy and slash them.
203_ItemDescription/871: You will summon an ultimate explosion after casting it for a certain amount of time. Its damage is overwhelming, and nothing will be left after that. The caster of this skill will be out of energy and down for a while.
203_ItemDescription/872: A magic that summons ice blades from the ground that pierce through the enemy.
203_ItemDescription/873: A single attack as you draw the sword.
203_ItemDescription/874: A magic that stops the enemy's time briefly. Using it repeatedly will give the enemy a resistance against this skill.
203_ItemDescription/875: Creates a potion that slightly heals the [STATS:HP].
203_ItemDescription/876: For a certain period of time the damage you give against natural trees or rocks will increase but your [STATS:HP] will decrease every time you attack.
203_ItemDescription/877: Your satiation level will not decrease for a certain amount of time.
203_ItemDescription/878: You will not use up your arrows for a certain amount of time.
203_ItemDescription/879: This move fills all empty inventory with meat.
203_ItemDescription/880: In return of [STATS:DEF] decreasing, [STATS:ATK] will greatly increase.
203_ItemDescription/881: Heals [STATS:HP] and [STATS:MP] when you are sleeping on the bed.
203_ItemDescription/882: This makes you transform into a wolf.
203_ItemDescription/883: Next time you receive a damaging attack, you'll obtain one random item.
203_ItemDescription/884: For a certain period of time, a sprout grows on your head, but the regeneration of [STATS:HP], [STATS:MP], [STATS:ST] are increased. Your movement speed decreases a bit, and you'll be hungry gradually.
203_ItemDescription/885: You will die doing this but you also give the enemy a huge damage from this self-explosion.
203_ItemDescription/886: This will allow you to fly freely. You will use up [STATS:MP] while you fly.
203_ItemDescription/887: You will turn into a giant.
203_ItemDescription/888: You can either catch a whale or a piece of trash.
203_ItemDescription/889: Sharpen your weapon to increase [STATS:ATK] of your next attack. You can stack this effect multiple times.
203_ItemDescription/890: Fire a bullet that calls upon a lightning strike when landing on the enemy.
203_ItemDescription/891: Create a bright flash at the end of your combo attack, blinding your surrounding enemies.
203_ItemDescription/892: Jump high to slash an enemy. If it hits their head, it decreases their [STATS:DEF].
203_ItemDescription/893: A move that allows for extreme combo attack. The move is so fast enough  to negate almost all attacks from enemies.
203_ItemDescription/894: Mow down all the enemies right in front of you.
203_ItemDescription/895: You will recover [STATS:HP], [STATS:MP] and [STATS:SP] by eating your pet or a charmed mob. You have a chance to obtain dropped items if you eat a charmed mob. No experience points will be granted.
203_ItemDescription/897: Brings up the crafting speed of a nearby building. This affects up to 9 buildings.
203_ItemDescription/898: [STATS:ATK] of you and your party members within a range will increase through your songs.
203_ItemDescription/899: Doubles the effects of any status-improving item that you use next.
203_ItemDescription/900: Detonates the last building you placed. The more valuable the building, the more powerful the explosion.
203_ItemDescription/901: Deal damage to the enemy through the use of your own money.
203_ItemDescription/902: Place more than one building at a time from your equipment. Note that some buildings cannot be used or have angle restrictions.
203_ItemDescription/903: Set up multiple farms or floors at once.
203_ItemDescription/904: Speeds up the plant's growth speed. This affects up to 9 Wheat Fields and Farmling Plots. Requires [ITEM:5615] to use this skill.
203_ItemDescription/905: Creates a bucket of water from nothing.
203_ItemDescription/907: A magic that creates a tornado that swallows up and shreds the enemy.
203_ItemDescription/908: You become invulnerable while casting and the skill heals the [STATS:HP] of the party member within a specified area.
203_ItemDescription/909: When attacking with a sword, your slashes send out additional magical slashes.
203_ItemDescription/910: Slightly increase the [STATS:MOVEMENT_SPEED] of allies within range.
203_ItemDescription/911: Summon a lightning spirit which continuously deals damage to enemies around.
203_ItemDescription/912: Creates a decoy doll that can capture the enemy's attention.
203_ItemDescription/913: Decrease the damage received from lava and poisonous swamp.
203_ItemDescription/914: Use an NPC's corpse as your pet.
203_ItemDescription/915: Summons a protective shield with durability based on [STATS:MAX_MP]. Magic damage will be reduced before this shield absorbs it.
203_ItemDescription/917: Drowning in ideals, this mountain of stained steel finds the truth. As fate had already decided, a realization of their own identity; fake. He still reached for those sinking ideals. unlimited fake blades.
203_ItemDescription/918: This move summons a random building.
203_ItemDescription/919: Ultimate magic that resurrects and heals all party members.
203_ItemDescription/92: A bow made of branches I picked up nearby. I can't wait to get a better bow.
203_ItemDescription/920: Convert surrounding items to different Material items. Requires Alchemical Catalyst to cast this spell. If it fails, items will be converted to Sand.
203_ItemDescription/921: Convert surrounding items to different Food items. Requires Alchemical Catalyst to cast this spell. If it fails, items will be converted to Sand.
203_ItemDescription/922: Consecutively fire magical bullets. These bullets can decrease enemies' shield just like normal attacks.
203_ItemDescription/923: A quick triple slash with a one-handed sword.
203_ItemDescription/924: Fasting from sunrise to sunset to increase [STATS:MATK], [STATS:CRITICAL_PROB_MAGICAL] and [STATS:CRITICAL_DMG_MAGICAL] until you eat or sunset.
203_ItemDescription/925: Once you cast this spell, increase [STATS:MATK] until the next cast, it will cost [STATS:HP] each time you cast Magic skills.
203_ItemDescription/926: Decrease [STATS:MAX_HP] and increase [STATS:MAX_MP] and [STATS:MP_RECOVER_RATE] for a period of time.
203_ItemDescription/927: [STATS:ATK] of you and your party members within a range will increase by encouraging them.
203_ItemDescription/928: Make a prayer to apply a random buff to yourself. Requires [ITEM:5565] to use this skill.
203_ItemDescription/929: This magic spreads miasma to poison surrounding enemies. The higher [STATS:MATK], the stronger poison.
203_ItemDescription/93: Bow made of copper. It works somewhat well but it only has so much power.
203_ItemDescription/931: Increase the [STATS:DEF] of allies within range.
203_ItemDescription/932: Continuously poke with a spear but consume [STATS:MP] little by little. When you poke enough times with it, you perform Strong Thrust. If it hits, the maximum Javelin Throw buff will be applied.
203_ItemDescription/933: Puts all of your pets in the field into the wait state. Pets in the wait state will stay still and not attack.
203_ItemDescription/934: Puts all of your pets in the field into the guard state. Pets in the guard state will follow a tamer and attack surrounding enemies.
203_ItemDescription/935: Puts all of your pets in the field into the following state. Pets in the following state will follow a tamer and not attack.
203_ItemDescription/936: Heals the [STATS:HP] of the pets within a specified area.
203_ItemDescription/937: Encourage your pets in the field to give them a buff.
203_ItemDescription/938: Resurrects the pet with the highest [STATS:LEVEL] among those with 0 [STATS:HP].
203_ItemDescription/939: Increases [STATS:MOVEMENT_SPEED] and [STATS:MOTION_SPEED] of the pets within range.
203_ItemDescription/94: Iron bow. Iron and steel are different so be careful.
203_ItemDescription/940: Returns all of your pets in the field into the inventory.
203_ItemDescription/941: Orders all of your pets in the field and the inventory to dash forwards to attack enemies.
203_ItemDescription/942: Puts all of your pets in the field into the assist state. Pets in the assist state will follow a tamer and attack surrounding enemies attacked by allies.
203_ItemDescription/943: Applies poisons to enemies for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/944: Heals themself to restore their Life, doesn't heal the owner.
203_ItemDescription/945: Deals massive damage to enemies for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/946: Deals damage to enemies around for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/947: Applies paralyzing to enemies for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/948: Applies freezing to enemies for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/949: Decreases enemies' shield for the owner.
203_ItemDescription/95: Silver bow.  Silver is said to fight off evil, so many monsters dislike it. If made into an alloy, it can become quite sturdy.
203_ItemDescription/950: Buffs a human being who looks like the owner.
203_ItemDescription/951: Heals a human being who looks like the owner.
203_ItemDescription/952: Heals human beings who look like the owner and their allies.
203_ItemDescription/953: Shout loudly to attack enemies around you.
203_ItemDescription/96: Golden bow. One of the expensive tools with elaborate decorations that only a handful of warriors can possess.
203_ItemDescription/97: Platinum bow. An expensive bow that shines white and bright.
203_ItemDescription/98: A bow made of adamantite. Using hard materials to create an item in which "Bendability" is important seems insane.
203_ItemDescription/99: A bow made of mythril. It looks like a bow that elves and dwarves prefer to use; however, it's an industrial product.

Can you help me crush?
600_NPCLine/1923: But why are you full of machine guns again ...?
600_NPCLine/1924:
I was saved!
But a large number of machine guns ...
Maybe there was an anti -aircraft position ...?
600_NPCLine/1925:
A large amount of machine gun ... Is there an anti -aircraft position ...?
I'm convinced of the crashed airship.
600_NPCLine/193: We will keep polishing our strengths forever!
600_NPCLine/1931: Hmm, even if this ship can be repaired, it probably needs a lot of fuel to operate.
600_NPCLine/1932:
Repair is important, but I think we should collect fuel in parallel now.
Could you help me collect "crude oil"?
600_NPCLine/1933: Crude oil can be obtained by defeating the machine around here or mining a bedrock.
600_NPCLine/1934: thank you! Crude oil is a valuable resource, but there must be something to mass -produce ...
600_NPCLine/1935: I wish I could mass -produce the rotation saw and the bedrock continuously.
600_NPCLine/194: Different [ITEM:2062] makes dishes taste different! Try this!
600_NPCLine/1941:
...Just between you and me, I found a treasure map while looking for repair parts.
But it's torn up, only half of it remains.
600_NPCLine/1942:
I'm thinking it's probably already halfway around the world.
Would you go check around here?
600_NPCLine/1943: Heh heh heh...we'll split the treasure, man!
600_NPCLine/1944:
Ok ok, now that we've got this...
We should be able to find the treasure!
600_NPCLine/1951: …The treasure map points to the inside of the cave.
600_NPCLine/1952:
If you're as good as you seem to be, you can explore the cave, right?
Would you mind taking a look around?
600_NPCLine/1953: Heh heh heh...we'll split the treasure, man!
600_NPCLine/1954:
Oh! You found it!
Let's see, let's see...this is a blueprint, isn't it?
600_NPCLine/1955: …I don't think this will do me much good, you can have it…
600_NPCLine/1956: I guess I'll have to take my job seriously after all....ho-ho-ho.
600_NPCLine/196: ...You can dig out the items like this sometimes...
600_NPCLine/197: Everyone is crazy about this in the future!
600_NPCLine/2: Krael, my god ... If it's for you ... Even death is nothing ...
600_NPCLine/20: An trial of football. If you're able to aim precisely, Krael the god shall approve of you.
600_NPCLine/21: An trial of speed. If you're able to get there fast, Krael the god shall approve of you. The higher level of an island, the shorter the time limit becomes.
600_NPCLine/2101:
Do you see that flat rock there?
That is called "Bedrock".
600_NPCLine/2102:
It's not infinite... but you can get minerals if you keep digging and digging.
If I were you, I'd clear the area around it and make a "base"!
600_NPCLine/2103:
Can you see that floating island in the sky?
I wonder how you get up there...?
600_NPCLine/2104:
There's no way you can fly in the sky...
Maybe you could build some sort of foothold in the air...?
600_NPCLine/2105:
Wow!
...What the hell, I thought you were a monster...
600_NPCLine/2106:
Are you sure you want to go back to the gate?
Don't give up, it's tough if you aren't at least Lv7!
600_NPCLine/2107:
Are you here to excavate the ruins too?
If so, there's a bridge ahead... but you mustn't cross it!
600_NPCLine/2108:
A giant is shooting arrows from far beyond the bridge...
If even one of those arrows hits you, you are done for!
600_NPCLine/2109:
Look closely. This soft rock here is breakable.
If you keep your eyes open, you should be able to spot them even from a distance!
600_NPCLine/2110:
By the way, that one and that one are hard, unbreakable rocks.
Why can't they be broken even though they look similar?
Ha, you'll have to ask God about that!
600_NPCLine/2111:
When you are in a pinch and need to make something quickly
You can make basic items and tools with your bare hands,
Although, you won't be able to make more than one at a time.
600_NPCLine/2112: The advantage of the workbench is that you can make many items at once.
600_NPCLine/2113:
This is a machine that can enhance weapons.
If you disassemble unnecessary weapons on the disassembly bench over there,
You can get the stones you need to enchance your weapons.
600_NPCLine/2114:
To strengthen a weapon, you need 'a stone of the same rank as the weapon'.
It can't be higher or lower, so be careful.
600_NPCLine/2115:
You can cook a variety of meals in the cooking pot.
Food doesn't just fill you up, it has a lot of extra benefits.
600_NPCLine/2116: Difficult dishes take time, so if you want to cook a lot, prepare a lot of pots.
600_NPCLine/2117:
You can climb up to high places if you build scaffolding,
But don't run out of materials on the way...
600_NPCLine/2119:
Farming is all about bartering with others.
He'll trade you the crops you need to grow for items that are useful for farming.
600_NPCLine/213: I don't mind if you take it with you...
600_NPCLine/214: If you break it, there won't be a second one, okay?
600_NPCLine/216:
God Krael...?
Haha, even if I pray to God, my stomach won't swell!
600_NPCLine/217:
Weapons and armor don't mean a thing if you don't equip them.
...I wanted to say that once!
600_NPCLine/219: Who should I ask for help...?
600_NPCLine/22: An trial of shooting. If you're able to shoot all the targets, Krael the god shall approve of you.
600_NPCLine/221: You don't look like you're from around here...
600_NPCLine/222: Wh-what do you want from me...?
600_NPCLine/225: You don't look like a hunter...
600_NPCLine/226: Sorry mate, I can't trade with you.
600_NPCLine/227: I saw someone suspicious... and that's you.
600_NPCLine/229: You shouldn't be here, should you?
600_NPCLine/230: I'm sorry, but could you do it later?
600_NPCLine/2300: There is evil in the air... it seems too dangerous to build anything around here...
600_NPCLine/2301: The doorway has been blocked by rocks... if only I had a pickaxe I could get out...
600_NPCLine/2302: The treasure is protected by a fierce guardian. Their sharp talons and fangs will tear apart any who seek to steal their treasure.
600_NPCLine/2303: The treasure is wrapped in a hard robe. Only the wise can get a chance to see it.
600_NPCLine/2304: The treasure is sunk in the tears of God. The tears will fall from the sky and rest in the hollows of the earth.
600_NPCLine/2305: You foolish adventurer, the treasure is not in ruin. Your wits will never be enough to lead you to the treasure.
600_NPCLine/2306:
~Written in Scavenger's Blood~
No... it must be in a smaller... stone...
(The rest of the writing is too blurred to read)
600_NPCLine/2307:
~Written in Scavenger's Blood~
The guardian is not a BEAR... they are...
(The rest of the writing is too blurred to read)
600_NPCLine/2308:
~Written in Scavenger's Blood~
Tears of God isn't a waterfall... is it rain...?
...there was a rock in a pond by the village that the bus plunged into, I recall...
(The rest of the writing is too blurred to read)
600_NPCLine/231: I'm sorry, but I don't have time for an outsider...
600_NPCLine/232: What's the matter with you, there's no extra fuel.
600_NPCLine/24: ※？△〇〇△×Δ (I am Anubis. Faithful minion of Krael the god.)
600_NPCLine/240:
... I haven't seen you around before.
As you can see, this is a small village, so strangers are easily noticeable.
Where did you come from?
600_NPCLine/241:
When you pressed a red switch, the world exploded ...
God Krael ordered you to the new world...?
600_NPCLine/243:
I don't know what you are trying to say, but...
We can't keep people who don't work around for very long.
600_NPCLine/244: I'm not saying it's a test but, I want you to show me you are someone worth keeping around.
600_NPCLine/245:
Well... there should be some sheep a little further east of here.
Why don't you go and hunt one?"
600_NPCLine/246:
If you can hunt, you can at least be self-sufficient.
I don't think the others in the village will complain about your stay.
600_NPCLine/247: How did it go? Were you able to hunt any sheep?
600_NPCLine/248: You can't hunt if you don't use the proper weapons. A bow or sword should do the trick!
600_NPCLine/249:
It looks like you had a successful hunt. Now, here's your reward.
I don't know who you are, but the settlement of beginnings welcomes you.
600_NPCLine/250:
Well, I've got another job for you right away.
...Wait, you didn't think hunting sheep would be all, did you?
600_NPCLine/2502: Icey ground can be counteracted by laying a floor on top of them!
600_NPCLine/2503: The wind blows against the wall in front of you! !
600_NPCLine/251:
If you follow the path up the cliffs around where you went sheep hunting earlier.
You'll reach an area with lots of wildflowers.
600_NPCLine/252:
There are 'red', 'blue' and 'yellow' herbs growing around there,
I want you to find and collect the three coloured herbs that are growing there.
600_NPCLine/253:
However, that area has become a stronghold for goblins.
Unlike sheep, goblins will attack you on sight.
You have to be very careful.
600_NPCLine/254: How did it go? Did you find all three kinds of the herbs?
600_NPCLine/255:
Herbs will grow back after a while.
If you need to gather more, just wait a little.
You'll be able to go back and gather more.
600_NPCLine/256:
Fufufu, looks like you made it back in one piece.
The herbs seem to be in perfect condition, as requested.
600_NPCLine/257:
Well, if you couldn't handle this then
the next job may have been too difficult for you.
Here is your reward, now on to the next job.
600_NPCLine/260:
Now, this time I'll need you to head out a bit further.
… don't worry, if you make it back in one piece,
this will be the last thing I ask of you.
600_NPCLine/261:
Around the village you'll only be able to find stone but,
on the south side of the island, near the cliffs, 
[ITEM:699] can be found.
600_NPCLine/262:
You should use that hoverboard I just gave you.
[ITEM:699] will be useful for many things.
Can you go and gather a lot?
600_NPCLine/264:
[ITEM:699][//Copper ore] can be found on the south side of the island,
You can find it around the cliffs.
600_NPCLine/266:
If you use a pickaxe or ax made from this copper ore,
It will make your collection more more efficient.
600_NPCLine/267:
This is a [ITEM:141][//glider] for you.
You can use it to glide from high places, so give it a try.
600_NPCLine/28: Woohoo! What a nice day today!
600_NPCLine/286:
The fields have to be built near a body of water or it becomes inefficient.
You have to get water from the water's edge with buckets....
600_NPCLine/287:
I wish there was a machine that could water the crops by itself...but that's just a pipe dream.
It would be a different story if we could at least dig a well...
600_NPCLine/288: Sow seeds... Water them... Harvest when they grow...
600_NPCLine/29: Is it time to sneak in to the dungeon?
600_NPCLine/295: Blessings of God Krael on you ...
600_NPCLine/296: I am on a mission to deliver ancient relics from God Krael...
600_NPCLine/297: If you are an "emissary of the old times", the inherited relics are in your hands...
600_NPCLine/3: Why is this happening to me ... My god ...
600_NPCLine/30: (Whew... Krael like to play terrible tricks on us, what a pain...)
600_NPCLine/31: I truly hope you will not regret this. Are you sure?
600_NPCLine/32: I'm gonna secretly set up a [ITEM_FAMILY:20205][//campfire] in front of that dude's house.
600_NPCLine/321: Hmm, it seems you aren't quite ready to investigate this area.
600_NPCLine/322: Come back after you've gotten a little stronger.
600_NPCLine/325: I'll head to the next biome when I'm done investigating the surrounding area.
600_NPCLine/33: They can get all burnt up and I won't care!
600_NPCLine/330: Now let's get to the point...
600_NPCLine/331:
Come to think of it, I haven't given my name yet.
My name is Camille, and I'm traveling around to find out what happened in the past.
600_NPCLine/332:
Originally, I was just investigating ruins for a living, but...
Rarely, things that are clearly beyond the level of our civilization are excavated from the ruins.
600_NPCLine/333:
I don't know what that "red switch" you are talking about is.
I believe this world once perished for some reason and civilization was born again.
600_NPCLine/334:
By the way, I'm sure you're wondering about that thing across the lake.
I think that "that" will be the best basis for proving my own theory.
600_NPCLine/335: I've been doing a lot of research and it seems that 'that thing' was the foundation of a building that was significant in a past era.
600_NPCLine/336:
...You've already figured it out, haven't you?
The reason I've asked you to collect various materials so far is to repair that thing.
600_NPCLine/337: If we can repair that building, maybe we can revive the lost civilization that once lived on this continent.
600_NPCLine/338:
While confirming my own theory,
It should also help you with the mission that God has bestowed on you.
600_NPCLine/339: Now, get on with repairing the tower!
600_NPCLine/34: I'm not jealous of a [ITEM:00143][//silver-glider] at all ...
600_NPCLine/340: You can access the building from the panel at the top of the stairs.
600_NPCLine/341: Wonderful... You've successfully repaired the Tower!
600_NPCLine/342:
There must be something still hidden in that tower...
Could you please look into it?
600_NPCLine/343:
Oh right, you should take this.
I found it near the ruins and it might be useful for something....
600_NPCLine/344: I think there is still something on top of the tower....
600_NPCLine/345:
I see that you were able to unlock the secret hidden in the tower....
Was that key the trigger....?
600_NPCLine/346:
In that case... No, I'd like to thank you first.
Take this with you, it's a vehicle excavated from the ruins.
600_NPCLine/347:
Treat it with care, because if you treat it roughly, it will break.
But as you restore more towers, you may eventually be able to make something like this one. Fufufu!
600_NPCLine/348:
Come to think of it, there's one place I'm curious about...
Have you been to the mountains in the southeast yet?
600_NPCLine/349:
If you follow the road up to the east of the village, you will find the 'ruins' where we were mining.
That's where we found the key.
600_NPCLine/35: I can fly a little with a [ITEM:00140][//stone-glider] too ...
600_NPCLine/350:
Actually, there is a big 'gate' in the ruins,
That 'gate' apparently leads to a dungeon somewhere.
600_NPCLine/351:
We went in for a bit to try it out, but it was complicated inside and there was a strong-looking monster at the very back.
We didn't think we could make it through.
600_NPCLine/352: As is often the case in fairy tales, strong monsters such as those are supposed to be guardians of some 'treasure'.
600_NPCLine/353:
It won't be as easy as fighting goblins.
You will need to prepare carefully so
I recommend crafting some new weapons and armor.
600_NPCLine/354: If you're under Lv7, I think you should prepare a little more.
600_NPCLine/355:
...Did you defeat that ferocious monster?
Fufufu... As expected, you are just the person I hoped you would be.
600_NPCLine/356:
Actually, there are multiple towers other than the one in this plateau.
I suspect there is a greater secret hidden in this land...
600_NPCLine/357:
Then we won't make much progress with our research just staying here.
We need to travel around and restore the towers!
...Of course you'll come with me, right?
600_NPCLine/358:
Well, now that we've decided that, let's make haste.
I'm going to pack up my stuff and head to the next village.
600_NPCLine/359:
Oh, don't forget to use the 'key' you got.
Well then, I'll be waiting for you at Milwyn Hills.
600_NPCLine/36: I won't do any pranks anymore so please forgive me!
600_NPCLine/37: When I was playing in the mountains, I found a place where you can excavate [ITEM:00706][//diamond]!
600_NPCLine/38: My [ITEM:00056][//stone-pickaxe] wasn't strong enough to excavate [ITEM:00706][//diamond] ...
600_NPCLine/41: There must be an angel or god in the Island of Sky.
600_NPCLine/410:
Hey, I've been waiting.
Before you came, I completed the investigation around here.
…Fufufu, I don’t mind if you praise me for being a truly excellent scholar.
600_NPCLine/411:
You may have already noticed, but...
This area has become a goblin den.
It seems that the people of the village are in trouble.
600_NPCLine/412:
In order to get the villager's cooperation,
Building friendly relationships will be essential.
600_NPCLine/413:
From what I've heard, there is a lack of weapons,
They don't seem to have enough to stop the goblins from attacking.
600_NPCLine/414:
According to my research, it seems that iron ore can be mined in abundance around here.
Because of that, you should supply the village with Iron One-Handed Swords and Iron Shields.
600_NPCLine/415:
You should be able to make Iron One-Handed Swords and Iron Shields by now.
...Unless you forgot to use the key to the plateau.
600_NPCLine/416: Iron ore is all around this village, so if you walk around a bit, you should be able to find it.
600_NPCLine/417:
Have you prepared the weapons?...Hmm, they're of good quality.
The people of the village will be happy with this.
600_NPCLine/418:
Alright, I'll pass them on.
I'm sure they'll be happy when they learn that you have helped them out.
600_NPCLine/419: By the way, while you were making weapons, I checked the structure of the tower.
600_NPCLine/420:
Apparently, this tower is strongly influenced by the biome around here.
In other words, it seems that "material derived from this land" is needed.
600_NPCLine/421:
Well, they can all be sourced around this hilly area.
I've given you a rough idea of the habitat area.
Please look around in the areas I've marked.
600_NPCLine/422:
I only need one to for my analysis...
You will probably use it too. I recommend you keep a few.
600_NPCLine/423: If you can't find it, open the map and take a closer look.
600_NPCLine/424: 1, 2, 3... hmm, looks like they're all there.
600_NPCLine/425: I thought this would be quicker with you having made it this far. Fufufu.
600_NPCLine/426:
Now then, let's get down to business.
I've had you wander around the area collecting items, and I'm sure you've seen...
600_NPCLine/427:
Did you see a large goblin village south of this village?
Originally, it seems that there were only a few goblins,
The number has increased greatly, and now it seems like that.
600_NPCLine/428:
The villagers seem to be doing their best to protect the village,
As long as they are outnumbered, they will continue to suffer.
…So, I wanted to give them that “thank you”.
600_NPCLine/429:
We need you to sneak into their settlements.
And I'd like you to 'borrow' a bit of the 'goblin treasure' that's hidden somewhere.
Can you 'borrow' some of it?"
600_NPCLine/43: I wonder how you can get to the Island of Sky?
600_NPCLine/430: It's a matter of stance, you know. If you don't fight back, you'll be taken advantage of. That's why if we show our "gratitude", I'm sure they should come to understand.
600_NPCLine/431:
There is an old saying.
'The only people you can shoot are those who are prepared to be shot.'
So...It's up to you!
600_NPCLine/432: It's "goblin treasure" ... of course it's in a treasure chest.
600_NPCLine/433:
Excellent! Just as I'd hoped!
They can't go too far if we are holding something important hostage... or 'borrowing' it, can they?"
600_NPCLine/434:
Negotiations are not just about talking.
Everything has to be balanced.
600_NPCLine/435:
There were creatures other than goblins in the settlement?
That is concerning...
600_NPCLine/436: Now, speaking of balance, now that the south has been cleared up, we now need to clear up the problem in the north.
600_NPCLine/437:
Actually, there are goblins living in the 'Abandoned Castle' in the north.
…But unlike the guys in the south, they don't attack this village.
600_NPCLine/438:
Because they seem to be getting all sorts of supplies from the dungeon at the back of that 'abandoned castle'.
I guess it's more efficient than having to travel to the village.
600_NPCLine/439:
There are two problems.
The first is that the goblins won't just let you investigate the abandoned castle.
The second is rumors of a powerful monster in the deepest part of the dungeon.
600_NPCLine/44: We're gonna try and get a big game today as well!
600_NPCLine/440:
He seems to be the leader of the warriors who once guarded the ruined castle,
It seems that now everyone who enters the ruined castle is dragged into the underworld.
…How can you sleep well with a monster like that nearby?
600_NPCLine/441:
So, I'm going to ask you to do one ghost-killing job for me.
I'm sure there's a key sealed deep in the dungeon.
That shouldn't be a bad deal for you.
600_NPCLine/442:
However, you should be careful...the enemies of the ruined castle are formidable.
That's right... you should be at least Lv. 15.
600_NPCLine/443: The enemies in the ruined castle are formidable. If you're around Lv20, you should be fine.
600_NPCLine/444:
Fufufu... incredible... you've exceeded my expectations!
Looks like you got the key too, didn't you?
600_NPCLine/445:
Now, once you have the key, there is only one thing to do.
Is the tower restored?
600_NPCLine/446: You're going to use that key quickly to open up a new era.
600_NPCLine/447: What's going on? ...Don't tell me that the tower hasn't been restored yet?
600_NPCLine/448: It seems that the evolution of the era has been completed.
600_NPCLine/449:
New technology drives the development of culture.
The air of stagnation that had spread over this land for a long time
It may change with your success.
600_NPCLine/450:
…If you just want to evolve the era,
Wouldn't it be better if we didn't have to kill the goblins?
600_NPCLine/451:
Hahaha! What are you talking about!
If there are people in the way, my investigation will not go well, right?
600_NPCLine/452:
Now, our next destination is the Yarden Meadow, which stretches out ahead of us.
It's the largest area in the land. Be ready for it.
I'll be on my way once I've completed my research.
600_NPCLine/46: I can't die without catching a [ITEM:02201][//whale-shark]!
600_NPCLine/460:
Hey, I've been waiting.
…how did you manage to break through hordes of goblins and giant monsters?
Fufufu, there's a secret path.
600_NPCLine/461:
I've searched around a bit, but I haven't seen any on the plateaus or hills.
New monsters also seem to live in this area.
Quite interesting...
600_NPCLine/462:
I would like to proceed with the investigation, but there are problems.
The people living here believe in living in harmony with nature.
It's like a hunting tribe in the mountains.
600_NPCLine/463:
Apparently they don't really like interacting with outsiders.
I also have trouble with new people.
600_NPCLine/464:
Fufufu, don't worry. I've already researched the solution.
In their customs, "being a hunter" seems to be a mark of a full-fledged person.
600_NPCLine/465:
If we prove to be good hunters.
They won't be able to dissuade us.
600_NPCLine/466:
From here, cross the river and go west, at the edge of the cliff
It seems that there is a "fortress protected by giants".
Defeating the giant and bringing back the treasure he protects seems to be the "Hunter's Ritual".
600_NPCLine/467:
The fort seems to be home to goblins as well...
Well, you should be fine.
I asked for this place for "my research".
600_NPCLine/468:
Anyway, this grass is huge...
It's quite a distance to the fort, too. You have to make use of vehicles.
600_NPCLine/469:
How's it going, did you get your proof?
Hmm, as expected, you are now a full-fledged hunter in both name and reality.
600_NPCLine/47: Location and equipment are important in fishing!
600_NPCLine/470:
Well, now that I'm recognised as a hunter too, I'll have to ingratiate myself.
...What's that look in your eyes?
600_NPCLine/471:
From a scholarly point of view,
This settlement is ill-prepared for the plague.
So I'm going to prepare an "antidote" for them.
600_NPCLine/472:
There's a 'poison swamp' just in the vicinity, perhaps due to a change in the nearby crust.
There should be no shortage of mushrooms to use as ingredients.
Go and procure a few ingredients for me.
600_NPCLine/473:
The antidote is made from poisonous mushrooms.
It's like using poison to control poison.
600_NPCLine/474:
Mm, this many mushrooms should be enough.
I'll take care of mixing the antidote.
600_NPCLine/475:
...there were mutated goblins that were different from the goblin settlements?
Hmmm... maybe the geology has some effect on goblin ecology...
600_NPCLine/476:
More importantly, there was a little trouble while you were out...
It seems that bandits broke in and tried to steal the chief's treasure.
600_NPCLine/477:
Apparently they were able to drive them away before anything was stolen,
People have been getting worked up that they're going to come back though.
600_NPCLine/478:
The bandit's name is 'Kevin' and he is said to be hiding in the eastern forest.
I want you to find him somehow and punish him with your own hands.
600_NPCLine/479:
I marked the approximate location of the forest,
I don't know where it actually is... I want you to find it somehow.
600_NPCLine/48: That old son of a bitch ...
600_NPCLine/480:
I told you it was important to hit back at the goblins, didn't I?
This will make them go away for a while.
... but he's not the kind of guy who learns his lesson, so I don't think he'll change his ways.
600_NPCLine/481:
Now then, shall we begin the restoration of the tower in earnest?
The tower here also seems to have the same basic structure as the tower on the hill.
600_NPCLine/482:
In other words, it seems that 'materials derived from this land' are necessary.
It looks like there's one around the northern lake and one in the woods you mentioned earlier.
600_NPCLine/483:
It's about you. You may have already restored the tower,
I also need a small amount for my research.

600_NPCLine/787: How is it going? Did you buy [ITEM:1223]?
600_NPCLine/79: Some lives... Shine bright even after death...
600_NPCLine/791:
Well, let's put aside whether we have enough or not!
Let's put it into practice right away!
600_NPCLine/792:
You should use the field there and try growing some potatoes.
Equip [ITEM:1223] and head to the field to sow seeds with [KEYMAP:AIM]! "
600_NPCLine/793:
Once the seeds are sown, it's time to water them.
Equip [ITEM:1919] and fetch some water from a nearby water source.
600_NPCLine/794:
Sprinkle water on the fields, and after some time you'll be able to harvest!
Now grow some [ITEM:1222] and bring them to me!
600_NPCLine/796:
Hmm, well done, these are nice potatoes!
The farmer over there will exchange the harvested crops for useful tools!
600_NPCLine/797:
You can expand your farms by placing more plots, wells and seed machines.
Better equipment will also help you increase the scale of your farming!
600_NPCLine/798:
This is a a gift for all new farmers! Take it!
Have a good farming life!
600_NPCLine/799:
Go to the field and press [KEYMAP:AIM] to scatter the equipped [ITEM:1223].
All that's left now is to fetch water with [ITEM:1919], sprinkle it on the field, and wait.
600_NPCLine/8: My name is Alexandria. What's your name?
600_NPCLine/80: You can use active skills by dragging them onto the hotkey. Only skills with square shapes are usable active skills.
600_NPCLine/81: Buy a good quality desk for working.
600_NPCLine/82: If I were to die... I prefer to die on the desk...
600_NPCLine/83: When you are ready to craft I recommend making a workbench. You will be able to craft many more things.
600_NPCLine/84: If we could fly freely... We would have a very different view of the world.
600_NPCLine/86: When you are done making the workbench, next up is making the [ITEM:00140][//stone glider].
600_NPCLine/87: Mankind continues to evolve...... Then enrages God... This is destiny determined by the land...
600_NPCLine/89: If you make the [ITEM:01200][//Altar of Civilization], you can evolve the age and unlock many new things to craft.
600_NPCLine/9: These are some rare things that no poor person can ever buy. You got money?
600_NPCLine/90: When in need of help, try speaking to various people.
600_NPCLine/901:
Are you still using "copper ingot"?
Sweet ... the times are "iron".
It's unlikely that that sturdy, versatile, or iron!
600_NPCLine/902:
This area is in an area blessed with iron.
The more you walk a little, the more you will find "iron ore"!
600_NPCLine/903:
Oh, this is this! This iron does a good job!
It becomes a weapon and various parts.
You should collect a lot!
600_NPCLine/904:
This area is in an area blessed with iron.
The more you walk a little, the more you will find "iron ore"!
600_NPCLine/905:
"Iron is stronger than copper!"
… Have you ever heard! Dahaha!
600_NPCLine/911:
It burned out ... completely ...
I can't move one step ...
I'm working too much and the battery runs out ...
600_NPCLine/912: It's out of the battery ... take a break ...
600_NPCLine/913:
Yes, this is this ...!
What ... Um ... it was out of the battery ...
I'm a human, so even if I get a battery normally ...
600_NPCLine/914: It's out of the battery ... take a break ...
600_NPCLine/915: Ah ... Thank you for many batteries ... but now I want a break ...
600_NPCLine/92: If you want to increase stats such as [STATS:MAX_HP] and [STATS:MAX_ST], climb to the sky. Once you are done exploring this island, next up is to create an [ITEM:01201][//Altar of Transportation].
600_NPCLine/921:
Actually, there is a goblin settlement nearby...
I can't sleep at night because I'm worried about them attacking...
If only I had a powerful weapon...!
600_NPCLine/922:
You want to hand out some swords...?
How barbaric!
Ah...if only I had a more refined and powerful weapon to defend ourselves with...!
600_NPCLine/923:
…This is…a gun…? Did you make it?
Wonderful! With this, we don't have to worry about any enemy that might come!
I think I can sleep well now!
600_NPCLine/924: Ah... if only I had a powerful weapon to defend myself with...!
600_NPCLine/925: Ah...but now that I think about it, I don't really know how to use it...
600_NPCLine/93: Watering the flowers is tough work...
600_NPCLine/931:
You!!!!! Do you like horses!!!!!
Horses are good right! ? So pretty! ! !
There are a lot of horses running about in the nearby fields! Go and see! ! ! !
600_NPCLine/932: In some countries, I hear strange stories about horses turning into girls.
600_NPCLine/933:
How were they! Horses!!!!
they are fast on their feet... Eh! ? You went hunting! ? ? ?
No...I told you to just go and look at them...
600_NPCLine/934: In some countries, I hear strange stories about horses turning into girls.
600_NPCLine/935: Wait a minute...what if we made a game were horses ran and competed against each other...
600_NPCLine/94: Do not interfere with the watering!
600_NPCLine/941:
Have you ever seen a goblin that uses a bow?
They shoot from high places and protect their comrades.
Be careful ...
600_NPCLine/942: I also got an arrow in the knee from them ...
600_NPCLine/943:
Did you defeat the bow goblins?
You're a lot of spear ...
600_NPCLine/944: I also received an arrow from my knees ...
600_NPCLine/945: If I don't get an arrow from my knee from the bow goblin, I will ...
600_NPCLine/95: If only there was a machine that automatically waters them...
600_NPCLine/951:
You also like you, fluffy.
I like it too, if it's good ... can you divide it a little?
600_NPCLine/953:
That's right, so this is this!
Ha ~ I don't have much sheep in this area ...
If you use this guy on a pillow, you can sleep well ...
600_NPCLine/955: Should I collect a lot of wool?
600_NPCLine/961:
I can't take it anymore…
I'm so thirsty...
I'm going to die...
600_NPCLine/963:
Oh, thank you! You saved my life...!
Eh, as much as this...?
No, everything has it's limits...
600_NPCLine/965: Ugh...I feel sick from drinking too much water...
600_NPCLine/97: The [ENEMY:00009][//bear] is very fast, so they caught up to me very quickly even if I ran...
600_NPCLine/971:
I saw... a man floating in mid-air, flying deep into the castle...
I don't believe in ghosts but...
You should go and check it out..."
600_NPCLine/973:
Eh? It was a monster, not a ghost ...?
Hahahaha! Well, I thought it was that all along!
600_NPCLine/975: No, come to think of it, monsters are scarier, aren't they?
600_NPCLine/98: I did manage to run away from the [ENEMY:00009][//bear]!
600_NPCLine/981: No, no, no, no! Call the landlady!
600_NPCLine/982:
You call something like this a dessert!?
…Huh, who are you! How about you make me a real dessert!
600_NPCLine/984:
You think this is a supreme dessert? Don't make me laugh!
You are blind to the true nature of cooking!
600_NPCLine/99: When the [ENEMY:00009][//bear] caught up to me, I kicked the bear into a river fearing for my life.
600_NPCLine/991:
...I'll give you one more chance.
This time bring me your 'supreme dish'!
600_NPCLine/992: Don't keep me waiting too long.
600_NPCLine/993:
That's right... what's important in cooking isn't technique or seasonings.
Thinking about and providing the best way to eat the ingredients for those who eat them...
600_NPCLine/994: That is what it means to be a "supreme" cook!
600_NPCLine/995: Don't keep me waiting too long.
600_NPCLine/996: Yes, cooking is the spirit of hospitality!

720_MainMissionName/0: Memory of the Ruin of Beginning
720_MainMissionName/1: Memory of the Old Garden of Undead
720_MainMissionName/2: Memory of the Ruin of Hunters
720_MainMissionName/3: Memory of the Old Garden of Storms
720_MainMissionName/4: Memory of the Labyrinth of Torrent
720_MainMissionName/5: Memory of the Old Garden of Massacre
720_MainMissionName/6: Memory of the Ruin of Everfrost
721_MainMissionDesc/0: The memory orb of "Satyr" protecting the Ruin of Beginning. There was the great explosion known as the "Great Destruction" that consumed the land of Craftopia and destroyed all civilizations. No one in this land knows the cause of the destruction. However, the guardian Satyr protects this land as if they prevent the cause of the destruction from returning to this land.
721_MainMissionDesc/1: The memory orb of "Messenger of the Underworld" protecting the Old Garden of Undead. Those who survived the Great Destruction sought a shelter from disasters and found the castle. The castle was designed to protect people from foreign enemies, but became a prison when that was besieged. The warrior who sacrifices themself to protect the people, even after their death, lures the souls of intruders who enter the castle to the underworld.
721_MainMissionDesc/2: The memory orb of "Lizard Gunner" protecting the Ruin of Hunters. A young lizard from the tribe of hunters abandoned their customs and became fascinated by the modern weapon found in the ruin. The inventor of these relics would never thought that these terrifying weapons would be used against human beings.
721_MainMissionDesc/3: The memory orb of "Griffin" protecting the Old Garden of Storms. A male dragon and a male griffin clashed fiercely in the sky above the grassy meadow. The winner got everything in their hands and became the king of the meadow. The loser, on the other hand, became the guardian of the narrow sky created by the earth, and has repelled anyone who attempted to break the seal.
721_MainMissionDesc/4: The memory orb of "Noble Frog" protecting the Labyrinth of Torrent. The former aristocrat who ruled the country was rejected by those who respected their traditions because they loved foreign cultures more than their own culture. But, the aristocrat exiles anyone who approaches the seal, even after their own body has been completely transformed. They're still doing this, to protect their own people, as if it is their duty to do so.
721_MainMissionDesc/5: The memory orb of "Lizard Executioner" protecting the Old Garden of Massacre. The executioner has never found condemnation good. Justice without fear is powerless. The executioner had to swing an axe to maintain the peace, regardless of his own will. Fear without justice is evil. The executioner must condemn intruders to prevent the nightmarish days from happening again.
721_MainMissionDesc/6: The memory orb of "Fenrir" protecting the Ruin of Everfrost. After the Great Destruction, the lord of wolves had gone in search of food. The white wolf, whose body has been transformed by the blessing of the earth, will wait and block intruders until the return of the lord.

999_NoGameText/Handover/Detail:
- Certain transferred items may not perform as they did in the classic version of Craftopia.
- Be careful when removing enchantments from transferred items, as they cannot be restored.
- You can perform the transfer multiple times. If you forget some items, you can try again.
- When you perform the transfer, all data in the Seamless version will be overwritten.
